Cities and parks are designed with different areas representing and attempting to imbue the atmosphere with the different names of God.

import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react';
import { Svg, Circle, Text, Line } from 'react-native-svg';
import { Animated, Easing } from 'react-native';
import { parseTime, mapTimeToAngle } from './Utils';
import { getCurrentPrayerName, getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat } from './PrayerTimeService';

const radius = 150;
const AnimatedCircle = Animated.createAnimatedComponent(Circle); // Create the AnimatedCircle component

const Sun = ({ prayerTimes }) => {
  const [displayText, setDisplayText] = useState('');
  const [anchor, setAnchor] = useState('end');
  const position = useRef(new Animated.ValueXY({ x: radius, y: radius })).current;

  const textX = position.x.interpolate({
    inputRange: [0, radius * 2],
    outputRange: [0, radius * 2],
  });

  const textY = position.y.interpolate({
    inputRange: [0, radius * 2],
    outputRange: [0, radius * 2],
  });

  const getSunPosition = (radians) => {
    const x = radius * Math.cos(radians) + radius;
    const y = radius - radius * Math.sin(radians);
    return { x, y };
  };

  const animateSunPosition = () => {
    const currentTimeString = getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat();
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(currentTimeString, prayerTimes) * Math.PI / 180;
    const newPosition = getSunPosition(angle);
    Animated.timing(position, {
      toValue: newPosition,
      duration: 100, // Adjust this for smoother/faster animation
      easing: Easing.linear,
      useNativeDriver: true,
    }).start();
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    const timer = setInterval(() => {
      animateSunPosition();

      const name = getCurrentPrayerName(prayerTimes);
      const timeString = new Date().toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour12: false });
      setDisplayText(`${timeString} ${name}`);
      setAnchor(["Asr", "Maghrib", "Isha"].includes(name) ? "start" : "end");
    }, 100); // Update every 100 milliseconds for smoother animation

    return () => clearInterval(timer);
  }, [prayerTimes]);


  return (
    <Svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox={`0 0 ${radius * 2} ${radius * 2}`}>
      <AnimatedCircle cx={position.x} cy={position.y} r="10" fill="blue" />
      <Animated.Text x={position.x} y={position.y}>
        {displayText}
      </Animated.Text>
      <Line x1="0" y1={radius} x2={radius * 2} y2={radius} stroke="black" />
    </Svg>
  );
};

export default Sun;

import React from 'react';

import * as d3 from 'd3-shape';

interface PrayerTimes {
  Fajr: number;
  Sunrise: number;
  Dhuhr: number;
  Asr: number;
  Maghrib: number;
  Isha: number;
  Fajr_tomorrow?: number;
}

interface PrayerArcsProps {
  prayerTimes: PrayerTimes;
  width: number;
  height: number;

}
const PrayerArcs: React.FC<PrayerArcsProps> = ({ prayerTimes, width, height }) => {
  const radius = 0.8 * Math.min(width, height) / 2;
  const thickness = 5; // Adjust this to set the thickness of your arcs


  // Define the arcs for the prayers
  const prayerArcs = [
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes), color: 'pink' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes), color: 'lightblue' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes), color: 'yellow' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes), color: 'orange' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes), color: 'purple' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr_tomorrow || prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes), color: 'darkblue' },
  ];

  const drawArc = (arc: { start: number; end: number }) => {
    const arcGenerator = d3.arc()
      .innerRadius(radius - thickness) // Set the inner radius
      .outerRadius(radius)
      .startAngle(arc.start)
      .endAngle(arc.end);

    return arcGenerator();
  };

    return (
    <Svg width={width} height={height}> 
      <G transform={`translate(${width / 2}, ${height / 2})`}> 
        {prayerArcs.map((arcItem, index) => (
          <Path key={index} d={drawArc(arcItem)} stroke={arcItem.color} strokeWidth={2} fill={arcItem.color} />
        ))}
      </G>
    </Svg>
  );
};

type PrayerTimes = {
    Fajr: string;
    Isha: string;
    [key: string]: string;
  };
  
  export const parseTime = (time: string): Date => {
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(parseInt(hours), parseInt(minutes), 0, 0);
    return date;
  };
  
  export const mapTimeToAngle = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes): number => {
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current.getTime() - start.getTime()) / (end.getTime() - start.getTime()) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
  };
  
  export const mapTimeToRadians = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes): number => {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
  };
  
  export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
    const currentTime = new Date();
    return currentTime.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
  };

//PrayerTimeService.tsx
import axios from 'axios';

const BASE_URL = 'https://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings';

type PrayerTimes = {
  [key: string]: string;
};

export const getCurrentPrayerName = (prayerTimes: PrayerTimes): string | undefined => {
  return Object.keys(prayerTimes).find(
    key => new Date() < new Date(prayerTimes[key])
  );
};

export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
  const currentTime = new Date();
  return currentTime.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
};

export const fetchPrayerTimesForDay = (date: Date, lat: number, lon: number): Promise<PrayerTimes> => {
  const url = `${BASE_URL}/${date.getDate()}-${date.getMonth() + 1}-${date.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`;
  return axios.get(url)
    .then(res => res.data.data.timings);
};

export const getCurrentPrayerTime = (currentTime: Date, times: PrayerTimes): { name: string, className: string } => {
  const prayerTimes = [
    { name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr' },
    { name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn' },
    { name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr' },
    { name: 'Asr', className: 'asr' },
    { name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib' },
    { name: 'Isha', className: 'isha' },
    { name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight' }
  ];
  for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
    const checkingTime = new Date();
    if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Late Night') {
      const [hours, minutes] = times['Fajr'].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    } else {
      const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    }
    checkingTime.setSeconds(0);
    checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0);
    if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
      return prayerTimes[i - 1];
    }
  }
  return { name: 'Night', className: 'night' };
};

//PrayerTimeService.tsx
import axios from 'axios';

const BASE_URL = 'https://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings';

export type PrayerTimes = {
  Fajr: string;
  Sunrise: string;
  Dhuhr: string;
  Asr: string;
  Maghrib: string;
  Isha: string;
  Fajr_tomorrow?: string;
};

type PrayerTimes = {
  [key: string]: string;
};

const transformPrayerTimes = (data: any): PrayerTimes => {
  return {
    Fajr: data.Fajr,
    Sunrise: data.Sunrise,
    Dhuhr: data.Dhuhr,
    Asr: data.Asr,
    Maghrib: data.Maghrib,
    Isha: data.Isha
  };
};

export const getCurrentPrayerName = (prayerTimes: PrayerTimes): string | undefined => {
  return Object.keys(prayerTimes).find(
    key => new Date() < new Date(prayerTimes[key])
  );
};

export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
  const currentTime = new Date();
  return currentTime.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
};

export const fetchPrayerTimesForDay = (date: Date, lat: number, lon: number): Promise<PrayerTimes> => {
  const url = `${BASE_URL}/${date.getDate()}-${date.getMonth() + 1}-${date.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`;
  return axios.get(url)
    .then(res => transformPrayerTimes(res.data.data.timings));
};


export const getCurrentPrayerTime = (currentTime: Date, times: PrayerTimes): { name: string, className: string } => {
  const prayerTimes = [
    { name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr' },
    { name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn' },
    { name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr' },
    { name: 'Asr', className: 'asr' },
    { name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib' },
    { name: 'Isha', className: 'isha' },
    { name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight' }
  ];
  for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
    const checkingTime = new Date();
    if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Late Night') {
      const [hours, minutes] = times['Fajr'].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    } else {
      const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    }
    checkingTime.setSeconds(0);
    checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0);
    if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
      return prayerTimes[i - 1];
    }
  }
  return { name: 'Night', className: 'night' };
};

  const textX = position.x.interpolate({

const PrayerArcs: React.FC<PrayerArcsProps> = ({ prayerTimes, width, height }) => {

  const thickness = 5; // Adjust this to set the thickness of your arcs


  // Define the arcs for the prayers
  const prayerArcs = [
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes), color: 'pink' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes), color: 'lightblue' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes), color: 'yellow' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes), color: 'orange' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes), color: 'purple' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr_tomorrow || prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes), color: 'darkblue' },
  ];

  const drawArc = (arc: { start: number; end: number }) => {
    const arcGenerator = d3.arc()
      .innerRadius(radius - thickness) // Set the inner radius
      .outerRadius(radius)
      .startAngle(arc.start)
      .endAngle(arc.end);

    return arcGenerator();

    return (

        ))}
      </G>
    </Svg>
  );
};

    const y = radius - radius * Math.cos(radians);
    return { x, y };
  };
  
  const animateSunPosition = () => {
    const currentTimeString = getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat();
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(currentTimeString, prayerTimes) * Math.PI / 180;
    const newPosition = getSunPosition(angle);
    Animated.timing(position, {
      toValue: newPosition,
      duration: 100, // Adjust this for smoother/faster animation
      easing: Easing.linear,
      useNativeDriver: true,
    }).start();
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    const timer = setInterval(() => {
      animateSunPosition();

      const name = getCurrentPrayerName(prayerTimes);
      const timeString = new Date().toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour12: false });
      setDisplayText(`${timeString} ${name}`);
      setAnchor(["Asr", "Maghrib", "Isha"].includes(name) ? "start" : "end");
    }, 100); // Update every 100 milliseconds for smoother animation

    return () => clearInterval(timer);
  }, [prayerTimes]);

  return (
    <Svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox={`0 0 ${(radius * 2)} ${radius * 2}`}>
      <AnimatedCircle cx={position.x} cy={position.y} r="10" fill="blue" />

      <Text
  x={textX}
  y={textY}
  textAnchor={anchor}
  fill="black"
  fontSize="16"
>
  {displayText}
</Text>
      <Line x1="0" y1={radius} x2={radius * 2} y2={radius} stroke="black" />
    </Svg>
  );
};

export default Sun;

function determineCurrentPrayer(currentTime, times) {
    return getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, times);

function changeBodyClass(className) {
    document.body.className = className;
}

function getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, times) {
    const prayerTimes = [
        {name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr'},
        {name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn'},
        {name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr'},
        {name: 'Asr', className: 'asr'},
        {name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib'},
        {name: 'Isha', className: 'isha'},
        {name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight'}  // added Late Night
    ];
    for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
        const checkingTime = new Date();
        // handle 'Late Night' separately
        if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Late Night') {
            const [hours, minutes] = times['Fajr'].split(':');
            checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1); // assuming 'Late Night' is an hour before 'Fajr'
            checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        } else {
            const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
            checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
            checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        }
        checkingTime.setSeconds(0);   // set seconds to zero
        checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0); // set milliseconds to zero
        if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
            return prayerTimes[i - 1];
        }
    }
    return {name: 'Night', className: 'night'};
}


function drawPath(segment, prayerTimes, line) {
    let startAngle, endAngle;
    if (segment.start === 'Late Night') {
        startAngle = 162;
        endAngle = 18;
    } else {
        startAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.start, prayerTimes);
        endAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.end, prayerTimes);
    }


    // Start at the offset angle, and decrease the angle (for clockwise direction)
    const points = d3.range(startAngle, endAngle, -0.1).map(angle => {
        const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
        return { x: radius * Math.cos(radians), y: radius * Math.sin(radians) };
    });
    svg.append('path').attr('d', line(points)).attr('stroke', segment.color).attr('stroke-width', 2).attr('fill', 'none');
}

function drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(prayerTimes[prayerName], prayerTimes);
    const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
    const x = -radius * Math.cos(radians);
    const y = radius * Math.sin(radians);
    const textAnchor = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? "start" : "end";
    const textX = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? x - 10 : x + 10;
    const textY = y < 0 ? y - 10 : y + 10;
    svg.append('text').attr('class', 'timeText').attr('x', textX).attr('y', textY).attr('text-anchor', textAnchor).text(prayerName + ' ' + prayerTimes[prayerName]);
}

function drawSunPath(prayerTimes) {
    const line = d3.line().x(d => -d.x).y(d => d.y);

    const prayerArcs = [
        new PrayerArc('Fajr', 'fajr', 'pink', prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes.Sunrise),
        new PrayerArc('Sunrise', 'dawn', 'lightblue', prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes.Dhuhr),
        new PrayerArc('Dhuhr', 'dhuhr', 'yellow', prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes.Asr),
        new PrayerArc('Asr', 'asr', 'orange', prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes.Maghrib),
        new PrayerArc('Maghrib', 'maghrib', 'purple', prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes.Isha),
        new PrayerArc('Isha', 'isha', 'darkblue', prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes.Fajr),
        new PrayerArc('Late Night', 'lateNight', 'black', 'Late Night', 'Fajr')
    ];

    prayerArcs.forEach(arc => arc.draw(prayerTimes, line));

    const timePoints = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

    timePoints.forEach(prayerName => drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes));
}

// Parse a time string into a Date object
function parseTime(time) {
    if (time instanceof Date) {
        time = time.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
    }
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle

function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
        return -18;
    }
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    // and scale it up by the ratio of the full circle to the angle range
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}

type PrayerTimes = {
    Fajr: string;
    Isha: string;
    [key: string]: string;
  };
  
  export const parseTime = (time: string): Date => {
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(parseInt(hours), parseInt(minutes), 0, 0);
    return date;
  };
  
  export const mapTimeToAngle = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes): number => {
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current.getTime() - start.getTime()) / (end.getTime() - start.getTime()) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
  };
  
  export const mapTimeToRadians = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes): number => {
        if (time === 'Late Night') {
          return 162 * (Math.PI / 180);
        } else {
          return mapTimeToAngle(time, prayerTimes) * (Math.PI / 180);
        }
      }
      
  
  export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
    const currentTime = new Date();
    return currentTime.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
  };

// file is ./components/PrayerTimeService.tsx
import axios from 'axios';

const BASE_URL = 'https://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings';
export type PrayerTimes = {
  [key: string]: string;
};

const prayerNames = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

interface PrayerTimes {
  Fajr: number;
  Sunrise: number;
  Dhuhr: number;
  Asr: number;
  Maghrib: number;
  Isha: number;
  Fajr_tomorrow: number;
}
const transformPrayerTimes = (data: any): PrayerTimes => {
  return {
    Fajr: data.Fajr,
    Sunrise: data.Sunrise,
    Dhuhr: data.Dhuhr,
    Asr: data.Asr,
    Maghrib: data.Maghrib,
    Isha: data.Isha
  };
};

export const getCurrentPrayerName = (prayerTimes: PrayerTimes): string | undefined => {
  return Object.keys(prayerTimes).find(
    key => new Date() < new Date(prayerTimes[key])
  );
};

export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
  const currentTime = new Date();
  return currentTime.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
};

export const fetchPrayerTimesForDay = (date: Date, lat: number, lon: number): Promise<PrayerTimes> => {
  const url = `${BASE_URL}/${date.getDate()}-${date.getMonth() + 1}-${date.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`;
  return axios.get(url)
    .then(res => transformPrayerTimes(res.data.data.timings));
};


export const getCurrentPrayerTime = (currentTime: Date, times: PrayerTimes): { name: string, className: string } => {
  const prayerTimes = [
    { name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr' },
    { name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn' },
    { name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr' },
    { name: 'Asr', className: 'asr' },
    { name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib' },
    { name: 'Isha', className: 'isha' },
    { name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight' }
  ];
  for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
    const checkingTime = new Date();
    if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Late Night') {
      const [hours, minutes] = times['Fajr'].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    } else {
      const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    }
    checkingTime.setSeconds(0);
    checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0);
    if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
      return prayerTimes[i - 1];
    }
  }
  return { name: 'Night', className: 'night' };
};

import axios from 'axios';

const BASE_URL = 'https://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings';
export type PrayerTimes = {
  [key: string]: string;
};

const prayerNames = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

interface PrayerTimes {
  Fajr: number;
  Sunrise: number;
  Dhuhr: number;
  Asr: number;
  Maghrib: number;
  Isha: number;
  Fajr_tomorrow: number;
}

const transformPrayerTimes = (data: any): PrayerTimes => {
  return {
    Fajr: data.Fajr,
    Sunrise: data.Sunrise,
    Dhuhr: data.Dhuhr,
    Asr: data.Asr,
    Maghrib: data.Maghrib,
    Isha: data.Isha
  };
};

export const getCurrentPrayerName = (prayerTimes: PrayerTimes): string | undefined => {
  return Object.keys(prayerTimes).find(
    key => new Date() < new Date(prayerTimes[key])
  );
};

export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
  const currentTime = new Date();
  return currentTime.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
};

export const fetchPrayerTimesForDay = (date: Date, lat: number, lon: number): Promise<PrayerTimes> => {
  const url = `${BASE_URL}/${date.getDate()}-${date.getMonth() + 1}-${date.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`;
  return axios.get(url)
    .then(res => transformPrayerTimes(res.data.data.timings));
};


export const getCurrentPrayerTime = (currentTime: Date, times: PrayerTimes): { name: string, className: string } => {
  const prayerTimes = [
    { name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr' },
    { name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn' },
    { name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr' },
    { name: 'Asr', className: 'asr' },
    { name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib' },
    { name: 'Isha', className: 'isha' },
    { name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight' }
  ];
  for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
    const checkingTime = new Date();
    if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Late Night') {
      const [hours, minutes] = times['Fajr'].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    } else {
      const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    }
    checkingTime.setSeconds(0);
    checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0);
    if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
      return prayerTimes[i - 1];
    }
  }
  return { name: 'Night', className: 'night' };
};

type PrayerTimes = {
    Fajr: string;
    Isha: string;
    [key: string]: string;
  };
  
  export const parseTime = (time: string): Date => {
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(parseInt(hours), parseInt(minutes), 0, 0);
    return date;
  };
  
  export const mapTimeToAngle = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes): number => {
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current.getTime() - start.getTime()) / (end.getTime() - start.getTime()) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
  };
  export const mapTimeToRadians = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes): number => {
    let radians: number;
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
      radians = 162 * (Math.PI / 180);
    } else {
      radians = mapTimeToAngle(time, times) * (Math.PI / 180);
    }
  
    // Subtract œÄ/2 to rotate 270 degrees
    radians -= Math.PI / 2;
  
    // Flip above the horizon by subtracting the angle from œÄ
    radians = Math.PI - radians;
  
    // Normalize the angle to the [0, 2œÄ] range if needed
    radians = (radians + 2 * Math.PI) % (2 * Math.PI);
  
    return radians;
  }
  
  
  export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
    const currentTime = new Date();
    return currentTime.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
  };

  const lat = FALLBACK_LAT;
  const lon = FALLBACK_LON;

  const [prayerTimes, setPrayerTimes] = useState<PrayerTimes | null>(null);
  const [currentPrayer, setCurrentPrayer] = useState<string | null>(null);



  useEffect(() => {
    const fetchPrayerTimes = async () => {
      const today = new Date();
      const tomorrow = new Date(today);
      tomorrow.setDate(tomorrow.getDate() + 1);

      try {
        const [todayTimes, tomorrowTimes] = await Promise.all([
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(today, lat, lon),
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(tomorrow, lat, lon)
        ]);

        setPrayerTimes({
          ...todayTimes,
          Fajr_tomorrow: tomorrowTimes.Fajr
        });
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Failed to fetch prayer times:', error);
        // ... rest of your error handling code ...
      }
    };
    fetchPrayerTimes();
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (prayerTimes) {
      const currentTime = new Date();
      const currentPrayer = getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, prayerTimes);
      setCurrentPrayer(currentPrayer.className);
    }
  }, [prayerTimes]);

  
  return (
    <View style={styles[currentPrayer || 'night']}>
      {prayerTimes && (

            <PrayerArcs prayerTimes={prayerTimes} width={width} height={height} />
          </View>
        </View>
      )}
    </View>
  );
};


export default App;

  Fajr: number;
  Sunrise: number;
  Dhuhr: number;
  Asr: number;
  Maghrib: number;
  Isha: number;
  Fajr_tomorrow?: number;
}

interface PrayerArcsProps {
  prayerTimes: PrayerTimes;
  width: number;
  height: number;
}

const PrayerArcs: React.FC<PrayerArcsProps> = ({ prayerTimes, width, height }) => {
  const radius = 0.8 * Math.min(width, height) / 2;
  const thickness = 5; // Adjust this to set the thickness of your arcs

  // Define the arcs for the prayers
  const prayerArcs = [
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes), color: 'pink' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes), color: 'green' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes), color: 'yellow' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes), color: 'orange' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes), color: 'purple' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr_tomorrow || prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes), color: 'darkblue' },
  ];

  const drawArc = (arc: { start: number; end: number }) => {
    const arcGenerator = d3.arc()
      .innerRadius(radius - thickness) // Set the inner radius
      .outerRadius(radius)
      .startAngle(arc.start)
      .endAngle(arc.end);

    return arcGenerator();
  };

  return (
    
    <Svg width={width} height={height}>
    <G transform={`translate(${width / 2}, ${height / 2})`}>
      {prayerArcs.map((arcItem, index) => (
        <React.Fragment key={index}>
          <Path d={drawArc(arcItem)} stroke={arcItem.color} strokeWidth={2} fill={arcItem.color} />
          <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
          <Text x={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start) + 10} y={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} fill={arcItem.color} fontSize={10}>
            {prayerNames[index]}
          </Text>
          <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.end)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.end)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
        </React.Fragment>
      ))}
    </G>
  </Svg>

  );
};

export default PrayerArcs;

import Sun from './components/Sun';
import { styles } from './Styles';

const FALLBACK_LAT = 50.6292; // Latitude for Lille, France
const FALLBACK_LON = 3.0573; // Longitude for Lille, France
const { width, height } = Dimensions.get('window'); // Getting screen width and height

const App = () => {
  const lat = FALLBACK_LAT;
  const lon = FALLBACK_LON;

  const [prayerTimes, setPrayerTimes] = useState<PrayerTimes | null>(null);
  const [currentPrayer, setCurrentPrayer] = useState<string | null>(null);



  useEffect(() => {
    const fetchPrayerTimes = async () => {
      const today = new Date();
      const tomorrow = new Date(today);
      tomorrow.setDate(tomorrow.getDate() + 1);

      try {
        const [todayTimes, tomorrowTimes] = await Promise.all([
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(today, lat, lon),
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(tomorrow, lat, lon)
        ]);

        setPrayerTimes({
          ...todayTimes,
          Fajr_tomorrow: tomorrowTimes.Fajr
        });
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Failed to fetch prayer times:', error);
        // ... rest of your error handling code ...
      }
    };
    fetchPrayerTimes();
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (prayerTimes) {
      const currentTime = moment(); // Create a Moment object with the current time
      const currentPrayer = getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, prayerTimes);
      setCurrentPrayer(currentPrayer.className);
    }
  }, [prayerTimes]);

  
  return (
    <View style={styles[currentPrayer || 'night']}>
      {prayerTimes && (
        <View style={{ width, height, position: 'relative' }}>
          <View style={{ position: 'absolute', left: 0, top: 0, width, height }}>
            <Sun prayerTimes={prayerTimes} />
          </View>
          <View style={{ position: 'absolute', left: 0, top: 0, width, height }}>
            <PrayerArcs prayerTimes={prayerTimes} width={width} height={height} />
          </View>
        </View>
      )}
    </View>
  );
};


export default App;

import axios from 'axios';
import moment from 'moment';

const BASE_URL = 'https://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings';
export type PrayerTimes = {
  [key: string]: number;
};

export const prayerNames = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

const transformPrayerTimes = (data: any): PrayerTimes => {
  return {
    Fajr: data.Fajr,
    Sunrise: data.Sunrise,
    Dhuhr: data.Dhuhr,
    Asr: data.Asr,
    Maghrib: data.Maghrib,
    Isha: data.Isha
  };
};

export const getCurrentPrayerName = (prayerTimes: PrayerTimes): string | undefined => {
  return Object.keys(prayerTimes).find(
    key => new Date() < new Date(prayerTimes[key])
  );
};

export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
  const currentTime = new Date();
  return currentTime.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
};

export const fetchPrayerTimesForDay = (date: Date, lat: number, lon: number): Promise<PrayerTimes> => {
  const url = `${BASE_URL}/${date.getDate()}-${date.getMonth() + 1}-${date.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`;
  return axios.get(url)
    .then(res => transformPrayerTimes(res.data.data.timings));
};
export const getCurrentPrayerTime = (currentTime: moment.Moment, times: PrayerTimes): { name: string, className: string } => {
  const prayerTimes = [
    { name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr' },
    { name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn' },
    { name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr' },
    { name: 'Asr', className: 'asr' },
    { name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib' },
    { name: 'Isha', className: 'isha' },
    { name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight' }
  ];

  for (let i = 0; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
    let checkingTime: moment.Moment;

    if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Fajr') {
      checkingTime = moment(times[prayerTimes[i].name], 'HH:mm');
      if (i > 0 && currentTime.isBefore(checkingTime)) {
        return { name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight' };
      }
    } else {
      checkingTime = moment(times[prayerTimes[i].name], 'HH:mm');
      if (currentTime.isBefore(checkingTime)) {
        return prayerTimes[i - 1];
      }
    }
  }

  return { name: 'Night', className: 'night' };
};

import React from 'react';
import { Path, G, Svg, Circle, Text } from 'react-native-svg'; // Import Svg, Circle, and Text
import { mapTimeToRadians } from './Utils';
import * as d3 from 'd3-shape';

const prayerNames = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];


interface PrayerTimes {
  Fajr: number;
  Sunrise: number;
  Dhuhr: number;
  Asr: number;
  Maghrib: number;
  Isha: number;
  Fajr_tomorrow?: number;
}

interface PrayerArcsProps {
  prayerTimes: PrayerTimes;
  width: number;
  height: number;
}

const PrayerArcs: React.FC<PrayerArcsProps> = ({ prayerTimes, width, height }) => {
  const radius = 0.8 * Math.min(width, height) / 2;
  const thickness = 5; // Adjust this to set the thickness of your arcs

  // Define the arcs for the prayers
  const prayerArcs = [
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes), color: 'pink' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes), color: 'lightblue' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes), color: 'pink' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes), color: 'orange' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes), color: 'purple' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr_tomorrow || prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes), color: 'darkblue' },
  ];

  const drawArc = (arc: { start: number; end: number }) => {
    const arcGenerator = d3.arc()
      .innerRadius(radius - thickness) // Set the inner radius
      .outerRadius(radius)
      .startAngle(arc.start)
      .endAngle(arc.end);

    return arcGenerator();
  };

  return (
    
     <Svg width={width} height={height}>
      <G transform={`translate(${width / 2}, ${height / 2})`}>
        {prayerArcs.map((arcItem, index) => (
          <React.Fragment key={index}>
            <Path d={drawArc(arcItem)} stroke={arcItem.color} strokeWidth={2} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Text x={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start) + 10} y={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} fill={arcItem.color} fontSize={10}>

          </React.Fragment>
        ))}
      </G>
    </Svg>

  );
};

export default PrayerArcs;

//App.tsx

import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { View, Dimensions } from 'react-native';
import moment from 'moment';
import { PrayerTimes, getCurrentPrayerTime, fetchPrayerTimesForDay } from './components/PrayerTimeService';
import PrayerArcs from './components/PrayerArcs';
import Sun from './components/Sun';
import { styles } from './Styles';

const FALLBACK_LAT = 50.6292; // Latitude for Lille, France
const FALLBACK_LON = 3.0573; // Longitude for Lille, France
const { width, height } = Dimensions.get('window'); // Getting screen width and height

const App = () => {
  const lat = FALLBACK_LAT;
  const lon = FALLBACK_LON;

  const [prayerTimes, setPrayerTimes] = useState<PrayerTimes | null>(null);
  const [currentPrayer, setCurrentPrayer] = useState<string | null>(null);



  useEffect(() => {
    const fetchPrayerTimes = async () => {
      const today = new Date();
      const tomorrow = new Date(today);
      tomorrow.setDate(tomorrow.getDate() + 1);

      try {
        const [todayTimes, tomorrowTimes] = await Promise.all([
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(today, lat, lon),
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(tomorrow, lat, lon)
        ]);

        setPrayerTimes({
          ...todayTimes,
          Fajr_tomorrow: tomorrowTimes.Fajr
        });
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Failed to fetch prayer times:', error);
        // ... rest of your error handling code ...
      }
    };
    fetchPrayerTimes();
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (prayerTimes) {
      const currentTime = moment(); // Create a Moment object with the current time
      const currentPrayer = getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, prayerTimes);
      setCurrentPrayer(currentPrayer.className);
    }
  }, [prayerTimes]);

  
  return (
    <View style={styles[currentPrayer || 'night']}>
      {prayerTimes && (
        <View style={{ width, height, position: 'relative' }}>
          <View style={{ position: 'absolute', left: 0, top: 0, width, height }}>
            <Sun prayerTimes={prayerTimes} />
          </View>
          <View style={{ position: 'absolute', left: 0, top: 0, width, height }}>
            <PrayerArcs prayerTimes={prayerTimes} width={width} height={height} />
          </View>
        </View>
      )}
    </View>
  );
};


export default App;

import axios from 'axios';
import moment from 'moment';

const BASE_URL = 'https://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings';
export type PrayerTimes = {
  [key: string]: number;
};

export const prayerNames = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

const transformPrayerTimes = (data: any): PrayerTimes => {
  return {
    Fajr: data.Fajr,
    Sunrise: data.Sunrise,
    Dhuhr: data.Dhuhr,
    Asr: data.Asr,
    Maghrib: data.Maghrib,
    Isha: data.Isha
  };
};

export const getCurrentPrayerName = (prayerTimes: PrayerTimes): string | undefined => {
  return Object.keys(prayerTimes).find(
    key => new Date() < new Date(prayerTimes[key])
  );
};

export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
  const currentTime = new Date();
  return currentTime.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
};

export const fetchPrayerTimesForDay = (date: Date, lat: number, lon: number): Promise<PrayerTimes> => {
  const url = `${BASE_URL}/${date.getDate()}-${date.getMonth() + 1}-${date.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`;
  return axios.get(url)
    .then(res => transformPrayerTimes(res.data.data.timings));
};
export const getCurrentPrayerTime = (currentTime: moment.Moment, times: PrayerTimes): { name: string, className: string } => {
  const prayerTimes = [
    { name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr' },
    { name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn' },
    { name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr' },
    { name: 'Asr', className: 'asr' },
    { name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib' },
    { name: 'Isha', className: 'isha' },
    { name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight' }
  ];

  for (let i = 0; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
    let checkingTime: moment.Moment;

    if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Fajr') {
      checkingTime = moment(times[prayerTimes[i].name], 'HH:mm');
      if (i > 0 && currentTime.isBefore(checkingTime)) {
        return { name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight' };
      }
    } else {
      checkingTime = moment(times[prayerTimes[i].name], 'HH:mm');
      if (currentTime.isBefore(checkingTime)) {
        return prayerTimes[i - 1];
      }
    }
  }

  return { name: 'Night', className: 'night' };
};//file is: ./Components/Utils.tsx 
import moment from 'moment';

  
export const parseTime = (time: string): moment.Moment => {
    return moment(time, 'HH:mm');
  };

  export const mapTimeToAngle = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes, prayerName: string): number => {
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current.diff(start) / end.diff(start)) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    console.log(`Prayer: ${prayerName}, Time: ${time}, Start: ${start.format('HH:mm')}, End: ${end.format('HH:mm')}, Current: ${current.format('HH:mm')}, Angle: ${-angle} degrees`);
    return -angle;
  };
  
  export const mapTimeToRadians = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes, prayerName: string): number => {
    let radians: number;
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
      radians = 162 * (Math.PI / 180);
    } else {
      radians = mapTimeToAngle(time, times, prayerName) * (Math.PI / 180);
    }
  
    // Subtract œÄ/2 to rotate 270 degrees
    radians -= Math.PI / 2;
  
    // Flip above the horizon by subtracting the angle from œÄ
    radians = Math.PI - radians;
  
    // Normalize the angle to the [0, 2œÄ] range if needed
    radians = (radians + 2 * Math.PI) % (2 * Math.PI);
  
    console.log(`Prayer: ${prayerName}, Time: ${time}, Radians: ${radians}`);
    return radians;
  };
    
  
export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
    return moment().format('HH:mm:ss');
  };

import React from 'react';
import { Path, G, Svg, Circle, Text } from 'react-native-svg'; // Import Svg, Circle, and Text
import { mapTimeToRadians } from './Utils';
import * as d3 from 'd3-shape';

const prayerNames = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];


interface PrayerTimes {
  Fajr: number;
  Sunrise: number;
  Dhuhr: number;
  Asr: number;
  Maghrib: number;
  Isha: number;
  Fajr_tomorrow?: number;
}

interface PrayerArcsProps {
  prayerTimes: PrayerTimes;
  width: number;
  height: number;
}

const PrayerArcs: React.FC<PrayerArcsProps> = ({ prayerTimes, width, height }) => {
  const radius = 0.8 * Math.min(width, height) / 2;
  const thickness = 5; // Adjust this to set the thickness of your arcs

  // Define the arcs for the prayers
  const prayerArcs = [
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes, 'Fajr'), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes, 'Sunrise'), color: 'pink' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes, 'Sunrise'), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes, 'Dhuhr'), color: 'lightblue' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes, 'Dhuhr'), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes, 'Asr'), color: 'pink' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes, 'Asr'), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes, 'Maghrib'), color: 'orange' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes, 'Maghrib'), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes, 'Isha'), color: 'purple' },
    { start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes, 'Isha'), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr_tomorrow || prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes, 'Fajr'), color: 'darkblue' },
  ];

  const drawArc = (arc: { start: number; end: number }) => {
    const arcGenerator = d3.arc()
      .innerRadius(radius - thickness) // Set the inner radius
      .outerRadius(radius)
      .startAngle(arc.start)
      .endAngle(arc.end);

    return arcGenerator();
  };

  return (
    
     <Svg width={width} height={height}>
      <G transform={`translate(${width / 2}, ${height / 2})`}>
        {prayerArcs.map((arcItem, index) => (
          <React.Fragment key={index}>
            <Path d={drawArc(arcItem)} stroke={arcItem.color} strokeWidth={2} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Text x={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start) + 10} y={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} fill={arcItem.color} fontSize={10}>
              {prayerNames[index]}
            </Text>
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.end)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.end)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
          </React.Fragment>
        ))}
      </G>
    </Svg>

  );
};

export default PrayerArcs;

import moment from 'moment';

  
export const parseTime = (time: string): moment.Moment => {
    return moment(time, 'HH:mm');
  };

  export const mapTimeToAngle = (time: string, startTime: string, endTime: string, prayerName: string): number => {
    const start = parseTime(startTime);
    const end = parseTime(endTime);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current.diff(start) / end.diff(start)) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    console.log(`Prayer: ${prayerName}, Time: ${time}, Start: ${start.format('HH:mm')}, End: ${end.format('HH:mm')}, Current: ${current.format('HH:mm')}, Angle: ${-angle} degrees`);
    return -angle;
  };
  
  
  export const mapTimeToRadians = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes, prayerName: string): number => {
    let radians: number;
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
      radians = 162 * (Math.PI / 180);
    } else {
      radians = mapTimeToAngle(time, times, prayerName) * (Math.PI / 180);
    }
  
    // Subtract œÄ/2 to rotate 270 degrees
    radians -= Math.PI / 2;
  
    // Flip above the horizon by subtracting the angle from œÄ
    radians = Math.PI - radians;
  
    // Normalize the angle to the [0, 2œÄ] range if needed
    radians = (radians + 2 * Math.PI) % (2 * Math.PI);
  
    console.log(`Prayer: ${prayerName}, Time: ${time}, Radians: ${radians}`);
    return radians;
  };
    
  
export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
    return moment().format('HH:mm:ss');
  };

  const fajrTomorrowRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr_tomorrow || prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes, 'Fajr');

  // Define the arcs for the prayers
  const prayerArcs = [
    { start: fajrRadians, end: sunriseRadians, color: 'pink' },
    { start: sunriseRadians, end: dhuhrRadians, color: 'lightblue' },
    { start: dhuhrRadians, end: asrRadians, color: 'pink' },
    { start: asrRadians, end: maghribRadians, color: 'orange' },

import moment from 'moment';

  
export const parseTime = (time: string): moment.Moment => {
    return moment(time, 'HH:mm');
  };
  export const mapTimeToAngle = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes, prayerName: string): number => {
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const startAngle = 198;
    const endAngle = -18;
    const totalAngleRange = startAngle - endAngle;
  
    // Linearly mapping the current time to the angle range
    const angle = startAngle - ((current.diff(start) / end.diff(start)) * totalAngleRange);
  
    console.log(`Prayer: ${prayerName}, Time: ${time}, Start: ${start.format('HH:mm')}, End: ${end.format('HH:mm')}, Current: ${current.format('HH:mm')}, Angle: ${angle} degrees`);
    return angle;
  };
  

export const mapTimeToRadians = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes, prayerName: string): number => {
  let radians: number;
  if (time === 'Late Night') {
    radians = 162 * (Math.PI / 180);
  } else {
    radians = mapTimeToAngle(time, times, prayerName) * (Math.PI / 180);
  }

  // Subtract œÄ/2 to rotate 270 degrees
  radians -= Math.PI / 2;

  // Flip above the horizon by subtracting the angle from œÄ
  radians = Math.PI - radians;

  // Normalize the angle to the [0, 2œÄ] range if needed
  radians = (radians + 2 * Math.PI) % (2 * Math.PI);

  return radians;
};
    
  
export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = (): string => {
    return moment().format('HH:mm:ss');
  };

  // Define the arcs for the prayers
  const prayerArcs = [
    { start: fajrRadians, end: sunriseRadians, color: 'pink' },

    { start: dhuhrRadians, end: asrRadians, color: 'pink' },
    { start: asrRadians, end: maghribRadians, color: 'orange' },
    { start: maghribRadians, end: ishaRadians, color: 'purple' },
    { start: ishaRadians, end: fajrTomorrowRadians, color: 'darkblue' },
  ];

  const drawArc = (arc: { start: number; end: number }) => {
    const arcGenerator = d3.arc()
      .innerRadius(radius - thickness) // Set the inner radius
      .outerRadius(radius)
      .startAngle(arc.start)
      .endAngle(arc.end);

    return arcGenerator();
  };

  return (
    
     <Svg width={width} height={height}>
      <G transform={`translate(${width / 2}, ${height / 2})`}>
        {prayerArcs.map((arcItem, index) => (
          <React.Fragment key={index}>
            <Path d={drawArc(arcItem)} stroke={arcItem.color} strokeWidth={2} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Text x={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start) + 10} y={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} fill={arcItem.color} fontSize={10}>
              {prayerNames[index]}
            </Text>
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.end)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.end)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
          </React.Fragment>
        ))}
      </G>
    </Svg>

  );
};

export default PrayerArcs;

import React from 'react';
import { Path, G, Svg, Circle, Text } from 'react-native-svg'; // Import Svg, Circle, and Text

interface PrayerTimes {
  Fajr: number;
  Sunrise: number;
  Dhuhr: number;
  Asr: number;
  Maghrib: number;
  Isha: number;
  Fajr_tomorrow?: number;
}

interface PrayerArcsProps {
  prayerTimes: PrayerTimes;
  width: number;
  height: number;
}

const PrayerArcs: React.FC<PrayerArcsProps> = ({ prayerTimes, width, height }) => {
  const radius = 0.8 * Math.min(width, height) / 2;
  const thickness = 5; // Adjust this to set the thickness of your arcs
  
  const prayerStartEndTimes = [
    { start: prayerTimes.Fajr, end: prayerTimes.Sunrise },
    { start: prayerTimes.Sunrise, end: prayerTimes.Dhuhr },
    { start: prayerTimes.Dhuhr, end: prayerTimes.Asr },
    { start: prayerTimes.Asr, end: prayerTimes.Maghrib },
    { start: prayerTimes.Maghrib, end: prayerTimes.Isha },
    { start: prayerTimes.Isha, end: prayerTimes.Fajr_tomorrow || prayerTimes.Fajr },
  ];
  // Calculate the radians for each prayer time
  const fajrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes, 'Fajr');
  const sunriseRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes, 'Sunrise');
  const dhuhrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes, 'Dhuhr');
  const asrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes, 'Asr');
  const maghribRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes, 'Maghrib');
  const ishaRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes, 'Isha');
  const fajrTomorrowRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr_tomorrow || prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes, 'Fajr');

  // Define the arcs for the prayers
  const prayerArcs = [
    { start: fajrRadians, end: sunriseRadians, color: 'yellow' },
    { start: sunriseRadians, end: dhuhrRadians, color: 'lightblue' },
    { start: dhuhrRadians, end: asrRadians, color: 'pink' },
    { start: asrRadians, end: maghribRadians, color: 'green' },
    { start: maghribRadians, end: ishaRadians, color: 'purple' },
    { start: ishaRadians, end: fajrTomorrowRadians, color: 'darkblue' },
  ];

  const drawArc = (arc: { start: number; end: number }) => {
    const arcGenerator = d3.arc()
      .innerRadius(radius - thickness) // Set the inner radius
      .outerRadius(radius)
      .startAngle(arc.start)
      .endAngle(arc.end);

    return arcGenerator();
  };

  return (
    
     <Svg width={width} height={height}>
      <G transform={`translate(${width / 2}, ${height / 2})`}>
        {prayerArcs.map((arcItem, index) => (
          <React.Fragment key={index}>
            <Path d={drawArc(arcItem)} stroke={arcItem.color} strokeWidth={2} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Text x={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start) + 10} y={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} fill={arcItem.color} fontSize={10}>
              {prayerNames[index]}
            </Text>
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.end)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.end)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
          </React.Fragment>
        ))}
      </G>
    </Svg>

  );
};

export default PrayerArcs;

import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react';
import { Svg, Circle, Text, Line } from 'react-native-svg';
import { Animated, Easing } from 'react-native';
import { parseTime, mapTimeToAngle } from './Utils';
import { getCurrentPrayerName, getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat } from './PrayerTimeService';

const radius = 150;
const AnimatedCircle = Animated.createAnimatedComponent(Circle); // Create the AnimatedCircle component

const Sun = ({ prayerTimes }) => {
  const [displayText, setDisplayText] = useState('');
  const [anchor, setAnchor] = useState('end');
  const position = useRef(new Animated.ValueXY({ x: radius, y: radius })).current;

  const textX = position.x.interpolate({
    inputRange: [0, radius * 2],
    outputRange: [0, radius * 2],
  });

  const textY = position.y.interpolate({
    inputRange: [0, radius * 2],
    outputRange: [20, radius * 2 + 20], // Added an offset to move the text down
  });

const getSunPosition = (radians) => {
  const x = radius + radius * Math.sin(radians);
  const y = radius - radius * Math.cos(radians);
  return { x, y };
};
  
  const animateSunPosition = () => {
    const currentTimeString = getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat();
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(currentTimeString, prayerTimes) * Math.PI / 180;
    const newPosition = getSunPosition(angle);
    Animated.timing(position, {
      toValue: newPosition,
      duration: 2000, // Adjust this for smoother/faster animation
      easing: Easing.linear,
      useNativeDriver: true,
    }).start();
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    const timer = setInterval(() => {
      animateSunPosition();

      const name = getCurrentPrayerName(prayerTimes);
      const timeString = new Date().toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour12: false });
      setDisplayText(`${timeString} ${name}`);
      setAnchor(["Asr", "Maghrib", "Isha"].includes(name) ? "start" : "end");
    }, 100); // Update every 100 milliseconds for smoother animation

    return () => clearInterval(timer);
  }, [prayerTimes]);

  return (
    <Svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox={`0 0 ${(radius * 2)} ${radius * 2}`}>
      <AnimatedCircle cx={position.x} cy={position.y} r="10" fill="blue" />

      <Text
  x={textX}
  y={textY}
  textAnchor={anchor}
  fill="black"
  fontSize="16"
>
  {displayText}
</Text>
      <Line x1="0" y1={radius} x2={radius * 2} y2={radius} stroke="black" />
    </Svg>
  );
};

export default Sun;

import moment from 'moment';

  
export const parseTime = (time: string): moment.Moment => {
    return moment(time, 'HH:mm');
  };
  
  export const mapTimeToAngle = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes, prayerName: string): number => {
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
  
    const totalStartAngle = 198; // Fajr angle
    const totalEndAngle = -18;   // Isha angle
    const totalAngleRange = totalStartAngle - totalEndAngle;
  
    // The fraction of the time between start and end
    const fractionOfDay = current.diff(start) / end.diff(start);

import React from 'react';
import { Path, G, Svg, Circle, Text } from 'react-native-svg'; // Import Svg, Circle, and Text
import { mapTimeToRadians } from './Utils';
import * as d3 from 'd3-shape';
import moment from 'moment';

const prayerNames = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];


interface PrayerTimes {
  Fajr: number;
  Sunrise: number;
  Dhuhr: number;
  Asr: number;
  Maghrib: number;
  Isha: number;
  Fajr_tomorrow?: number;
}

interface PrayerArcsProps {
  prayerTimes: PrayerTimes;
  width: number;
  height: number;
}

const PrayerArcs: React.FC<PrayerArcsProps> = ({ prayerTimes, width, height }) => {
  const radius = 0.8 * Math.min(width, height) / 2;
  const thickness = 5; // Adjust this to set the thickness of your arcs

  // Calculate the radians for each prayer time
  const fajrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes, 'Fajr');
  const sunriseRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes, 'Sunrise');
  const dhuhrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes, 'Dhuhr');
  const asrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes, 'Asr');
  const maghribRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes, 'Maghrib');
  const ishaRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes, 'Isha');
  const fajrTomorrowRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes, '');

  // Define the arcs for the prayers
  const prayerArcs = [
    { start: fajrRadians, end: sunriseRadians, color: 'yellow' },
    { start: sunriseRadians, end: dhuhrRadians, color: 'lightblue' },
    { start: dhuhrRadians, end: asrRadians, color: 'pink' },
    { start: asrRadians, end: maghribRadians, color: 'green' },
    { start: maghribRadians, end: ishaRadians, color: 'purple' },
  ];

  const drawArc = (arc: { start: number; end: number }) => {
    const arcGenerator = d3.arc()
      .innerRadius(radius - thickness) // Set the inner radius
      .outerRadius(radius)
      .startAngle(arc.start)
      .endAngle(arc.end);

    return arcGenerator();
  };

  return (
    
     <Svg width={width} height={height}>
      <G transform={`translate(${width / 2}, ${height / 2})`}>
        {prayerArcs.map((arcItem, index) => (
          <React.Fragment key={index}>
            <Path d={drawArc(arcItem)} stroke={arcItem.color} strokeWidth={2} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Text x={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start) + 10} y={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} fill={arcItem.color} fontSize={10}>
              {prayerNames[index]}
            </Text>
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.end)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.end)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
          </React.Fragment>
        ))}
      </G>
    </Svg>

  );
};

export default PrayerArcs;

function getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, times) {
    const prayerTimes = [
        {name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr'},
        {name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn'},
        {name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr'},
        {name: 'Asr', className: 'asr'},
        {name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib'},
        {name: 'Isha', className: 'isha'},
        {name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight'}  // added Late Night
    ];
    for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
        const checkingTime = new Date();
        // handle 'Late Night' separately
        if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Late Night') {
            const [hours, minutes] = times['Fajr'].split(':');
            checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1); // assuming 'Late Night' is an hour before 'Fajr'
            checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        } else {
            const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
            checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
            checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        }
        checkingTime.setSeconds(0);   // set seconds to zero
        checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0); // set milliseconds to zero
        if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
            return prayerTimes[i - 1];
        }
    }
    return {name: 'Night', className: 'night'};
}


function drawPath(segment, prayerTimes, line) {
    let startAngle, endAngle;
    if (segment.start === 'Late Night') {
        startAngle = 162;
        endAngle = 18;
    } else {
        startAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.start, prayerTimes);
        endAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.end, prayerTimes);
    }


    // Start at the offset angle, and decrease the angle (for clockwise direction)
    const points = d3.range(startAngle, endAngle, -0.1).map(angle => {
        const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
        return { x: radius * Math.cos(radians), y: radius * Math.sin(radians) };
    });
    svg.append('path').attr('d', line(points)).attr('stroke', segment.color).attr('stroke-width', 2).attr('fill', 'none');
}

function drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(prayerTimes[prayerName], prayerTimes);
    const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
    const x = -radius * Math.cos(radians);
    const y = radius * Math.sin(radians);
    const textAnchor = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? "start" : "end";
    const textX = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? x - 10 : x + 10;
    const textY = y < 0 ? y - 10 : y + 10;
    svg.append('text').attr('class', 'timeText').attr('x', textX).attr('y', textY).attr('text-anchor', textAnchor).text(prayerName + ' ' + prayerTimes[prayerName]);
}

function drawSunPath(prayerTimes) {
    const line = d3.line().x(d => -d.x).y(d => d.y);

    const prayerArcs = [
        new PrayerArc('Fajr', 'fajr', 'pink', prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes.Sunrise),
        new PrayerArc('Sunrise', 'dawn', 'lightblue', prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes.Dhuhr),
        new PrayerArc('Dhuhr', 'dhuhr', 'yellow', prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes.Asr),
        new PrayerArc('Asr', 'asr', 'orange', prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes.Maghrib),
        new PrayerArc('Maghrib', 'maghrib', 'purple', prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes.Isha),
        new PrayerArc('Isha', 'isha', 'darkblue', prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes.Fajr),
        new PrayerArc('Late Night', 'lateNight', 'black', 'Late Night', 'Fajr')
    ];

    prayerArcs.forEach(arc => arc.draw(prayerTimes, line));

    const timePoints = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

    timePoints.forEach(prayerName => drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes));
}

// Parse a time string into a Date object
function parseTime(time) {
    if (time instanceof Date) {
        time = time.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
    }
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle

function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
        return -18;
    }
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    // and scale it up by the ratio of the full circle to the angle range
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}

import React from 'react';
import { Path, G, Svg, Circle, Text } from 'react-native-svg'; // Import Svg, Circle, and Text
import { mapTimeToRadians } from './Utils';
import * as d3 from 'd3-shape';
import moment from 'moment';

const prayerNames = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];


interface PrayerTimes {
  Fajr: number;
  Sunrise: number;
  Dhuhr: number;
  Asr: number;
  Maghrib: number;
  Isha: number;
  Fajr_tomorrow: number;
}

interface PrayerArcsProps {
  prayerTimes: PrayerTimes;
  width: number;
  height: number;
}

const PrayerArcs: React.FC<PrayerArcsProps> = ({ prayerTimes, width, height }) => {
  const radius = 0.8 * Math.min(width, height) / 2;
  const thickness = 5; // Adjust this to set the thickness of your arcs

  // Calculate the radians for each prayer time
  const fajrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes, 'Fajr');
  const sunriseRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes, 'Sunrise');
  const dhuhrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes, 'Dhuhr');
  const asrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes, 'Asr');
  const maghribRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes, 'Maghrib');
  const ishaRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes, 'Isha');
  const fajrTomorrowRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr_tomorrow || prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes, 'LateNight');

  // Define the arcs for the prayers
  const prayerArcs = [
    { start: fajrRadians, end: sunriseRadians, color: 'yellow' },
    { start: sunriseRadians, end: dhuhrRadians, color: 'blue' },
    { start: dhuhrRadians, end: asrRadians, color: 'pink' },
    { start: asrRadians, end: maghribRadians, color: 'green' },
    { start: maghribRadians, end: ishaRadians, color: 'purple' },
    { start: ishaRadians, end: fajrTomorrowRadians, color: 'darkblue' },
  ];

  const drawArc = (arc: { start: number; end: number }) => {
    const arcGenerator = d3.arc()
      .innerRadius(radius - thickness) // Set the inner radius
      .outerRadius(radius)
      .startAngle(arc.start)
      .endAngle(arc.end);

    return arcGenerator();
  };

  return (
    
     <Svg width={width} height={height}>
      <G transform={`translate(${width / 2}, ${height / 2})`}>
        {prayerArcs.map((arcItem, index) => (
          <React.Fragment key={index}>
            <Path d={drawArc(arcItem)} stroke={arcItem.color} strokeWidth={2} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Text x={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start) + 10} y={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} fill={arcItem.color} fontSize={10}>
              {prayerNames[index]}
            </Text>
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.end)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.end)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
          </React.Fragment>
        ))}
      </G>
    </Svg>

  );
};

export default PrayerArcs;

//App.tsx

import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { View, Dimensions } from 'react-native';
import moment from 'moment';
import { PrayerTimes, getCurrentPrayerTime, fetchPrayerTimesForDay } from './components/PrayerTimeService';
import PrayerArcs from './components/PrayerArcs';
import Sun from './components/Sun';
import { styles } from './Styles';

const FALLBACK_LAT = 50.6292; // Latitude for Lille, France
const FALLBACK_LON = 3.0573; // Longitude for Lille, France
const { width, height } = Dimensions.get('window'); // Getting screen width and height

const App = () => {
  const lat = FALLBACK_LAT;
  const lon = FALLBACK_LON;

  const [prayerTimes, setPrayerTimes] = useState<PrayerTimes | null>(null);
  const [currentPrayer, setCurrentPrayer] = useState<string | null>(null);



  useEffect(() => {
    const fetchPrayerTimes = async () => {
      const today = new Date();
      const tomorrow = new Date(today);
      tomorrow.setDate(tomorrow.getDate() + 1);

      try {
        const [todayTimes, tomorrowTimes] = await Promise.all([
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(today, lat, lon),
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(tomorrow, lat, lon)
        ]);

        setPrayerTimes({
          ...todayTimes,
          Fajr_tomorrow: tomorrowTimes.Fajr
        });
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Failed to fetch prayer times:', error);
        // ... rest of your error handling code ...
      }
    };
    fetchPrayerTimes();
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (prayerTimes) {
      const currentTime = moment(); // Create a Moment object with the current time
      const currentPrayer = getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, prayerTimes);
      setCurrentPrayer(currentPrayer.className);
    }
  }, [prayerTimes]);

  
  return (
    <View style={styles[currentPrayer || 'night']}>
      {prayerTimes && (
        <View style={{ width, height, position: 'relative' }}>
          <View style={{ position: 'absolute', left: 0, top: 0, width, height }}>
            <Sun prayerTimes={prayerTimes} />
          </View>
          <View style={{ position: 'absolute', left: 0, top: 0, width, height }}>
            <PrayerArcs prayerTimes={prayerTimes} width={width} height={height} />
          </View>
        </View>
      )}
    </View>
  );
};


export default App;

import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react';
import { Svg, G, Circle, Text, Line } from 'react-native-svg';
import { Animated, Easing } from 'react-native';
import { parseTime, mapTimeToRadians } from './Utils'; // Import mapTimeToRadians
import { getCurrentPrayerName, getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat } from './PrayerTimeService';

const radius = 150;
const AnimatedCircle = Animated.createAnimatedComponent(Circle); // Create the AnimatedCircle component

const Sun = ({ prayerTimes }) => {
  const [displayText, setDisplayText] = useState('');
  const [anchor, setAnchor] = useState('end');
  const position = useRef(new Animated.ValueXY({ x: radius, y: radius })).current;

  const textX = position.x.interpolate({
    inputRange: [0, radius * 2],
    outputRange: [0, radius * 2],
  });

  const textY = position.y.interpolate({
    inputRange: [0, radius * 2],
    outputRange: [20, radius * 2 + 20], // Added an offset to move the text down
  });
  const getSunPosition = (radians) => {
    const x = radius + radius * Math.sin(radians);
    const y = radius - radius * Math.cos(radians);
    return { x, y };
  };
  
  
const animateSunPosition = () => {
  const currentTimeString = getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat();
  const radians = mapTimeToRadians(currentTimeString, prayerTimes); // Use mapTimeToRadians here
  const newPosition = getSunPosition(radians); // Pass radians to getSunPosition
  Animated.timing(position, {
    toValue: newPosition,
    duration: 2000,
    easing: Easing.linear,
    useNativeDriver: true,
  }).start();
};

  useEffect(() => {
    const timer = setInterval(() => {
      animateSunPosition();

      const name = getCurrentPrayerName(prayerTimes);
      const timeString = new Date().toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour12: false });
      setDisplayText(`${timeString} ${name}`);
      setAnchor(["Asr", "Maghrib", "Isha"].includes(name) ? "start" : "end");
    }, 100); // Update every 100 milliseconds for smoother animation

    return () => clearInterval(timer);
  }, [prayerTimes]);

  return (
    <Svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox={`0 0 ${(radius * 2)} ${radius * 2}`}>
      <AnimatedCircle cx={position.x} cy={position.y} r="10" fill="blue" />
  <Text
        x={textX}
        y={textY}
        textAnchor={anchor}
        fill="black"
        fontSize="16"
      >
        {displayText}
      </Text>
    
    </Svg>
    );
};

export default Sun;

import React from 'react';
import { Path, G, Svg, Circle, Text } from 'react-native-svg'; // Import Svg, Circle, and Text
import { mapTimeToRadians } from './Utils';
import * as d3 from 'd3-shape';
import moment from 'moment';

const prayerNames = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];


interface PrayerTimes {
  Fajr: number;
  Sunrise: number;
  Dhuhr: number;
  Asr: number;
  Maghrib: number;
  Isha: number;
  Fajr_tomorrow: number;
}

interface PrayerArcsProps {
  prayerTimes: PrayerTimes;
  width: number;
  height: number;
}

const PrayerArcs: React.FC<PrayerArcsProps> = ({ prayerTimes, width, height }) => {
  const radius = 0.8 * Math.min(width, height) / 2;
  const thickness = 5; // Adjust this to set the thickness of your arcs

  // Calculate the radians for each prayer time
  const fajrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes, 'Fajr');
  const sunriseRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes, 'Sunrise');
  const dhuhrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes, 'Dhuhr');
  const asrRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes, 'Asr');
  const maghribRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes, 'Maghrib');
  const ishaRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes, 'Isha');
  const fajrTomorrowRadians = mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr_tomorrow || prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes, 'LateNight');

  // Define the arcs for the prayers
  const prayerArcs = [
    { start: fajrRadians, end: sunriseRadians, color: 'yellow' },
    { start: sunriseRadians, end: dhuhrRadians, color: 'blue' },
    { start: dhuhrRadians, end: asrRadians, color: 'pink' },
    { start: asrRadians, end: maghribRadians, color: 'green' },
    { start: maghribRadians, end: ishaRadians, color: 'purple' },
    { start: ishaRadians, end: fajrTomorrowRadians, color: 'darkblue' },
  ];

  const drawArc = (arc: { start: number; end: number }) => {
    const arcGenerator = d3.arc()
      .innerRadius(radius - thickness) // Set the inner radius
      .outerRadius(radius)
      .startAngle(arc.start)
      .endAngle(arc.end);

    return arcGenerator();
  };

  
  return (
    <Svg width={width} height={height}>
      <G transform={`translate(${width / 2}, ${height / 2}) rotate(0)`}>
        {prayerArcs.map((arcItem, index) => (
          <React.Fragment key={index}>
            <Path d={drawArc(arcItem)} stroke={arcItem.color} strokeWidth={2} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
            <Text
              x={0}
              y={0}
              transform={`translate(${radius * Math.sin(arcItem.start) + 10}, ${-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.start)}) rotate(108)`}
              fill={arcItem.color}
              fontSize={10}
            >
              {prayerNames[index]}
            </Text>            
            <Circle cx={radius * Math.sin(arcItem.end)} cy={-radius * Math.cos(arcItem.end)} r={thickness} fill={arcItem.color} />
          </React.Fragment>
        ))}
      </G>
    </Svg>
  );

  

};

export default PrayerArcs;

  date.setHours(parseInt(hours), parseInt(minutes), 0, 0);

  const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
  return -angle;
};

  date.setHours(parseInt(hours), parseInt(minutes), 0, 0);

};

  const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
  const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
  const current = parseTime(time);

  return -angle;
};

const mapTimeToRadians = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes) => {
  const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
  const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
  const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
  return radians;
};


const getCurrentPrayerTime = (currentTime: Date, times: PrayerTimes): PrayerTime => {
  const prayerTimes = [
    {name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr'},

        checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1);
        checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);

        checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
        checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
      }

    if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
      return prayerTimes[i - 1 < 0 ? prayerTimes.length - 1 : i - 1];
    }
  }
  return {name: 'Night', className: 'night'};

// Fetch prayer times for a given day
function fetchPrayerTimesForDay(date) {
    return fetch(`http://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings/${date.getDate()}-${date.getMonth()+1}-${date.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`)

function moveIndicator(currentTime, times, distancePerSecond, dayLengthSeconds) {

}


function determineCurrentPrayer(currentTime, times) {
    return getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, times);

function changeBodyClass(className) {
    document.body.className = className;
}

function getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, times) {
    const prayerTimes = [
        {name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr'},
        {name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn'},
        {name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr'},
        {name: 'Asr', className: 'asr'},
        {name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib'},
        {name: 'Isha', className: 'isha'},
        {name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight'}  // added Late Night
    ];
    for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
        const checkingTime = new Date();
        // handle 'Late Night' separately
        if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Late Night') {
            const [hours, minutes] = times['Fajr'].split(':');
            checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1); // assuming 'Late Night' is an hour before 'Fajr'
            checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        } else {
            const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
            checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
            checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        }
        checkingTime.setSeconds(0);   // set seconds to zero
        checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0); // set milliseconds to zero
        if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
            return prayerTimes[i - 1];
        }
    }
    return {name: 'Night', className: 'night'};
}


function drawPath(segment, prayerTimes, line) {
    let startAngle, endAngle;
    if (segment.start === 'Late Night') {
        startAngle = 162;
        endAngle = 18;
    } else {
        startAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.start, prayerTimes);
        endAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.end, prayerTimes);
    }


    // Start at the offset angle, and decrease the angle (for clockwise direction)
    const points = d3.range(startAngle, endAngle, -0.1).map(angle => {
        const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
        return { x: radius * Math.cos(radians), y: radius * Math.sin(radians) };
    });
    svg.append('path').attr('d', line(points)).attr('stroke', segment.color).attr('stroke-width', 2).attr('fill', 'none');
}

function drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(prayerTimes[prayerName], prayerTimes);
    const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
    const x = -radius * Math.cos(radians);
    const y = radius * Math.sin(radians);
    const textAnchor = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? "start" : "end";
    const textX = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? x - 10 : x + 10;
    const textY = y < 0 ? y - 10 : y + 10;
    svg.append('text').attr('class', 'timeText').attr('x', textX).attr('y', textY).attr('text-anchor', textAnchor).text(prayerName + ' ' + prayerTimes[prayerName]);
}

function drawSunPath(prayerTimes) {
    const line = d3.line().x(d => -d.x).y(d => d.y);

    const prayerArcs = [
        new PrayerArc('Fajr', 'fajr', 'pink', prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes.Sunrise),
        new PrayerArc('Sunrise', 'dawn', 'lightblue', prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes.Dhuhr),
        new PrayerArc('Dhuhr', 'dhuhr', 'yellow', prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes.Asr),
        new PrayerArc('Asr', 'asr', 'orange', prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes.Maghrib),
        new PrayerArc('Maghrib', 'maghrib', 'purple', prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes.Isha),
        new PrayerArc('Isha', 'isha', 'darkblue', prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes.Fajr),
        new PrayerArc('Late Night', 'lateNight', 'black', 'Late Night', 'Fajr')
    ];

    prayerArcs.forEach(arc => arc.draw(prayerTimes, line));

    const timePoints = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

    timePoints.forEach(prayerName => drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes));
}

// Parse a time string into a Date object
function parseTime(time) {
    if (time instanceof Date) {
        time = time.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
    }
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle

function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
        return -18;
    }
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    // and scale it up by the ratio of the full circle to the angle range
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}
