const FALLBACK_LON = 3.0573; // Longitude for Lille, France

import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { View, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';
import { parseTime, mapTimeToAngle } from './components/Utils';

import Sun from './components/Sun';
import axios from 'axios';

type PrayerTimes = {
  Fajr: string;
  Sunrise: string;
  Dhuhr: string;
  Asr: string;
  Maghrib: string;
  Isha: string;
  Fajr_tomorrow?: string;
};

type PrayerTime = {
  name: string;
  className: string;
};

const App = () => {
  const lat = FALLBACK_LAT;
  const lon = FALLBACK_LON;

  const [prayerTimes, setPrayerTimes] = useState<PrayerTimes | null>(null);
  const [currentPrayer, setCurrentPrayer] = useState<string | null>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    const fetchPrayerTimes = async () => {
      const today = new Date();
      const tomorrow = new Date(today);
      tomorrow.setDate(tomorrow.getDate() + 1);

      try {
        const [todayTimes, tomorrowTimes] = await Promise.all([
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(today, lat, lon),
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(tomorrow, lat, lon)
        ]);

        setPrayerTimes({
          ...todayTimes,
          Fajr_tomorrow: tomorrowTimes.Fajr
        });
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Failed to fetch prayer times:', error);
        // ... rest of your error handling code ...
      }
    };
    fetchPrayerTimes();
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (prayerTimes) {
      const currentTime = new Date();
      const currentPrayer = getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, prayerTimes);
      setCurrentPrayer(currentPrayer.className);
    }
  }, [prayerTimes]);

  return (
    <View style={styles[currentPrayer || '']}>
      {prayerTimes && <Sun prayerTimes={prayerTimes} />}
    </View>
  );
};

const fetchPrayerTimesForDay = (date: Date, lat: number, lon: number) => {
  return axios.get(`https://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings/${date.getDate()}-${date.getMonth()+1}-${date.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`)
    .then(res => res.data.data.timings);
};

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  fajr: { backgroundColor: 'pink' },
  dawn: { backgroundColor: 'lightblue' },
  dhuhr: { backgroundColor: 'yellow' },
  asr: { backgroundColor: 'orange' },
  maghrib: { backgroundColor: 'purple' },
  isha: { backgroundColor: 'darkblue' },
  lateNight: { backgroundColor: 'black' },
  night: { backgroundColor: 'black' }
});


const mapTimeToRadians = (time: string, times: PrayerTimes) => {
  const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
  const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
  const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
  return radians;
};

const getCurrentPrayerTime = (currentTime: Date, times: PrayerTimes): PrayerTime => {
  const prayerTimes = [
    {name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr'},
    {name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn'},
    {name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr'},
    {name: 'Asr', className: 'asr'},
    {name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib'},
    {name: 'Isha', className: 'isha'},
    {name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight'}
  ];
  for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
    const checkingTime = new Date();
    if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Late Night') {
      const [hours, minutes] = times['Fajr'].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    } else {
      const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    }
    checkingTime.setSeconds(0);
    checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0);
    if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
      return prayerTimes[i - 1];
    }
  }
  return {name: 'Night', className: 'night'};
};
export default App;

const Sun = ({ prayerTimes }) => {
  const [displayText, setDisplayText] = useState('');
  const [anchor, setAnchor] = useState('end');
  const position = useRef(new Animated.ValueXY({ x: radius, y: radius })).current;

  const textX = position.x.interpolate({
    inputRange: [0, radius * 2],
    outputRange: [0, radius * 2],
  });

  const textY = position.y.interpolate({
    inputRange: [0, radius * 2],
    outputRange: [0, radius * 2],
  });

  const getSunPosition = (radians) => {
    const x = radius * Math.cos(radians) + radius;
    const y = radius - radius * Math.sin(radians);
    return { x, y };
  };

  const animateSunPosition = () => {
    const currentTimeString = getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat();
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(currentTimeString, prayerTimes) * Math.PI / 180;
    const newPosition = getSunPosition(angle);
    Animated.timing(position, {
      toValue: newPosition,
      duration: 100, // Adjust this for smoother/faster animation
      easing: Easing.linear,
      useNativeDriver: true,
    }).start();
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    const timer = setInterval(() => {
      animateSunPosition();

      const name = getCurrentPrayerName(prayerTimes);
      const timeString = new Date().toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour12: false });
      setDisplayText(`${timeString} ${name}`);
      setAnchor(["Asr", "Maghrib", "Isha"].includes(name) ? "start" : "end");
    }, 100); // Update every 100 milliseconds for smoother animation

    return () => clearInterval(timer);
  }, [prayerTimes]);


  return (
    <Svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox={`0 0 ${radius * 2} ${radius * 2}`}>
      <AnimatedCircle cx={position.x} cy={position.y} r="10" fill="blue" />
      <Animated.Text
        x={position.x}
        y={position.y.interpolate({
          inputRange: [0, radius * 2],
          outputRange: [-30, radius * 2 - 30], // This will keep the text above the sun
        })}
        textAnchor={anchor}
      >
        {displayText}
      </Animated.Text>
      <Line x1="0" y1={radius} x2={radius * 2} y2={radius} stroke="black" />
    </Svg>
  );
};

export default Sun;

import axios from 'axios';

const BASE_URL = 'https://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings';



export const getCurrentPrayerName = (prayerTimes) => {
  return Object.keys(prayerTimes).find(
    key => new Date() < new Date(prayerTimes[key])
  );
};

export const getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat = () => {
  const currentTime = new Date();
  return currentTime.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
};


export const fetchPrayerTimesForDay = (date: Date, lat: number, lon: number) => {
  const url = `${BASE_URL}/${date.getDate()}-${date.getMonth() + 1}-${date.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`;
  return axios.get(url)
    .then(res => res.data.data.timings);
};

export const getCurrentPrayerTime = (currentTime: Date, times: any): any => {
  
  const prayerTimes = [
    {name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr'},
    {name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn'},
    {name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr'},
    {name: 'Asr', className: 'asr'},
    {name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib'},
    {name: 'Isha', className: 'isha'},
    {name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight'}
  ];
  for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
    const checkingTime = new Date();
    if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Late Night') {
      const [hours, minutes] = times['Fajr'].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    } else {
      const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
      checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
      checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
    }
    checkingTime.setSeconds(0);
    checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0);
    if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
      return prayerTimes[i - 1];
    }
  }
  return {name: 'Night', className: 'night'};
};

const FALLBACK_LAT = 50.6292; // Latitude for Lille, France
const FALLBACK_LON = 3.0573; // Longitude for Lille, France

import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { View, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';
import { parseTime, mapTimeToAngle, mapTimeToRadians } from './components/Utils';
import { fetchPrayerTimesForDay, getCurrentPrayerTime } from './components/PrayerTimeService';


import Sun from './components/Sun';
import axios from 'axios';

type PrayerTimes = {
  Fajr: string;
  Sunrise: string;
  Dhuhr: string;
  Asr: string;
  Maghrib: string;
  Isha: string;
  Fajr_tomorrow?: string;
};

type PrayerTime = {
  name: string;
  className: string;
};

const App = () => {
  const lat = FALLBACK_LAT;
  const lon = FALLBACK_LON;

  const [prayerTimes, setPrayerTimes] = useState<PrayerTimes | null>(null);
  const [currentPrayer, setCurrentPrayer] = useState<string | null>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    const fetchPrayerTimes = async () => {
      const today = new Date();
      const tomorrow = new Date(today);
      tomorrow.setDate(tomorrow.getDate() + 1);

      try {
        const [todayTimes, tomorrowTimes] = await Promise.all([
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(today, lat, lon),
          fetchPrayerTimesForDay(tomorrow, lat, lon)
        ]);

        setPrayerTimes({
          ...todayTimes,
          Fajr_tomorrow: tomorrowTimes.Fajr
        });
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Failed to fetch prayer times:', error);
        // ... rest of your error handling code ...
      }
    };
    fetchPrayerTimes();
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (prayerTimes) {
      const currentTime = new Date();
      const currentPrayer = getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, prayerTimes);
      setCurrentPrayer(currentPrayer.className);
    }
  }, [prayerTimes]);

  return (
    <View style={styles[currentPrayer || '']}>
      {prayerTimes && <Sun prayerTimes={prayerTimes} />}

  );
};

  dawn: { backgroundColor: 'lightblue' },
  dhuhr: { backgroundColor: 'yellow' },
  asr: { backgroundColor: 'orange' },
  maghrib: { backgroundColor: 'purple' },
  isha: { backgroundColor: 'darkblue' },
  lateNight: { backgroundColor: 'black' },
  night: { backgroundColor: 'black' }
});


export default App;

            checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1); // assuming 'Late Night' is an hour before 'Fajr'
            checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        } else {

            checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
            checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        }
        checkingTime.setSeconds(0);   // set seconds to zero
        checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0); // set milliseconds to zero
        if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
            return prayerTimes[i - 1];
        }
    }
    return {name: 'Night', className: 'night'};

function drawPath(segment, prayerTimes, line) {
    let startAngle, endAngle;
    if (segment.start === 'Late Night') {

        endAngle = 18;
    } else {

        endAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.end, prayerTimes);
    }

    const points = d3.range(startAngle, endAngle, -0.1).map(angle => {

        return { x: radius * Math.cos(radians), y: radius * Math.sin(radians) };
    });

}

function drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(prayerTimes[prayerName], prayerTimes);
    const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
    const x = -radius * Math.cos(radians);
    const y = radius * Math.sin(radians);
    const textAnchor = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? "start" : "end";
    const textX = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? x - 10 : x + 10;
    const textY = y < 0 ? y - 10 : y + 10;
    svg.append('text').attr('class', 'timeText').attr('x', textX).attr('y', textY).attr('text-anchor', textAnchor).text(prayerName + ' ' + prayerTimes[prayerName]);
}

function drawSunPath(prayerTimes) {
    const line = d3.line().x(d => -d.x).y(d => d.y);

    const prayerArcs = [
        new PrayerArc('Fajr', 'fajr', 'pink', prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes.Sunrise),
        new PrayerArc('Sunrise', 'dawn', 'lightblue', prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes.Dhuhr),
        new PrayerArc('Dhuhr', 'dhuhr', 'yellow', prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes.Asr),
        new PrayerArc('Asr', 'asr', 'orange', prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes.Maghrib),
        new PrayerArc('Maghrib', 'maghrib', 'purple', prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes.Isha),
        new PrayerArc('Isha', 'isha', 'darkblue', prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes.Fajr),
        new PrayerArc('Late Night', 'lateNight', 'black', 'Late Night', 'Fajr')
    ];

    prayerArcs.forEach(arc => arc.draw(prayerTimes, line));

    const timePoints = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

    timePoints.forEach(prayerName => drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes));
}

// Parse a time string into a Date object
function parseTime(time) {
    if (time instanceof Date) {
        time = time.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
    }
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle

function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
        return -18;
    }
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    // and scale it up by the ratio of the full circle to the angle range
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}

import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react';
import { Svg, Circle, Text, Line } from 'react-native-svg';
import { Animated, Easing } from 'react-native';
import { parseTime, mapTimeToAngle } from './Utils';
import { getCurrentPrayerName, getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat } from './PrayerTimeService';

const radius = 150;
const AnimatedCircle = Animated.createAnimatedComponent(Circle); // Create the AnimatedCircle component

const Sun = ({ prayerTimes }) => {
  const [displayText, setDisplayText] = useState('');
  const [anchor, setAnchor] = useState('end');
  const position = useRef(new Animated.ValueXY({ x: radius, y: radius })).current;

  const textX = position.x.interpolate({
    inputRange: [0, radius * 2],
    outputRange: [0, radius * 2],
  });

  const textY = position.y.interpolate({
    inputRange: [0, radius * 2],
    outputRange: [0, radius * 2],
  });

  const getSunPosition = (radians) => {
    const x = radius * Math.cos(radians) + radius;
    const y = radius - radius * Math.sin(radians);
    return { x, y };
  };

  const animateSunPosition = () => {
    const currentTimeString = getCurrentTimeIn24HourFormat();
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(currentTimeString, prayerTimes) * Math.PI / 180;
    const newPosition = getSunPosition(angle);
    Animated.timing(position, {
      toValue: newPosition,
      duration: 100, // Adjust this for smoother/faster animation
      easing: Easing.linear,
      useNativeDriver: true,
    }).start();
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    const timer = setInterval(() => {
      animateSunPosition();

      const name = getCurrentPrayerName(prayerTimes);
      const timeString = new Date().toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour12: false });
      setDisplayText(`${timeString} ${name}`);
      setAnchor(["Asr", "Maghrib", "Isha"].includes(name) ? "start" : "end");
    }, 100); // Update every 100 milliseconds for smoother animation

    return () => clearInterval(timer);
  }, [prayerTimes]);


  return (
    <Svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox={`0 0 ${radius * 2} ${radius * 2}`}>
      <AnimatedCircle cx={position.x} cy={position.y} r="10" fill="blue" />
      <Animated.Text x={position.x} y={position.y}>
        {displayText}
      </Animated.Text>
      <Line x1="0" y1={radius} x2={radius * 2} y2={radius} stroke="black" />
    </Svg>
  );
};

export default Sun;

// Constants

    const y = -radius * Math.sin(radians); // Negate y to rotate clockwise
    return { x, y };

// Fetch prayer times for a given day
function fetchPrayerTimesForDay(date) {
    return fetch(`http://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings/${date.getDate()}-${date.getMonth()+1}-${date.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`)

function moveIndicator(currentTime, times, distancePerSecond, dayLengthSeconds) {

}


function determineCurrentPrayer(currentTime, times) {
    return getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, times);
}



function changeBodyClass(className) {
    document.body.className = className;
}

function getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, times) {
    const prayerTimes = [
        {name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr'},
        {name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn'},
        {name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr'},
        {name: 'Asr', className: 'asr'},
        {name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib'},
        {name: 'Isha', className: 'isha'},
        {name: 'Late Night', className: 'lateNight'}  // added Late Night
    ];
    for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
        const checkingTime = new Date();
        // handle 'Late Night' separately
        if (prayerTimes[i].name === 'Late Night') {
            const [hours, minutes] = times['Fajr'].split(':');
            checkingTime.setHours(+hours - 1); // assuming 'Late Night' is an hour before 'Fajr'
            checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        } else {
            const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
            checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
            checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        }
        checkingTime.setSeconds(0);   // set seconds to zero
        checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0); // set milliseconds to zero
        if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
            return prayerTimes[i - 1];
        }
    }
    return {name: 'Night', className: 'night'};
}


function drawPath(segment, prayerTimes, line) {
    let startAngle, endAngle;
    if (segment.start === 'Late Night') {
        startAngle = 162;
        endAngle = 18;
    } else {
        startAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.start, prayerTimes);
        endAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.end, prayerTimes);
    }


    // Start at the offset angle, and decrease the angle (for clockwise direction)
    const points = d3.range(startAngle, endAngle, -0.1).map(angle => {
        const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
        return { x: radius * Math.cos(radians), y: radius * Math.sin(radians) };
    });
    svg.append('path').attr('d', line(points)).attr('stroke', segment.color).attr('stroke-width', 2).attr('fill', 'none');
}

function drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(prayerTimes[prayerName], prayerTimes);
    const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
    const x = -radius * Math.cos(radians);
    const y = radius * Math.sin(radians);
    const textAnchor = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? "start" : "end";
    const textX = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? x - 10 : x + 10;
    const textY = y < 0 ? y - 10 : y + 10;
    svg.append('text').attr('class', 'timeText').attr('x', textX).attr('y', textY).attr('text-anchor', textAnchor).text(prayerName + ' ' + prayerTimes[prayerName]);
}

function drawSunPath(prayerTimes) {
    const line = d3.line().x(d => -d.x).y(d => d.y);

    const prayerArcs = [
        new PrayerArc('Fajr', 'fajr', 'pink', prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes.Sunrise),
        new PrayerArc('Sunrise', 'dawn', 'lightblue', prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes.Dhuhr),
        new PrayerArc('Dhuhr', 'dhuhr', 'yellow', prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes.Asr),
        new PrayerArc('Asr', 'asr', 'orange', prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes.Maghrib),
        new PrayerArc('Maghrib', 'maghrib', 'purple', prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes.Isha),
        new PrayerArc('Isha', 'isha', 'darkblue', prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes.Fajr),
        new PrayerArc('Late Night', 'lateNight', 'black', 'Late Night', 'Fajr')
    ];

    prayerArcs.forEach(arc => arc.draw(prayerTimes, line));

    const timePoints = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

    timePoints.forEach(prayerName => drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes));
}

// Parse a time string into a Date object
function parseTime(time) {
    if (time instanceof Date) {
        time = time.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
    }
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle

function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
        return -18;
    }
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    // and scale it up by the ratio of the full circle to the angle range
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}

import React from 'react';

import { Path, G, Svg } from 'react-native-svg'; // Import Svg

import { mapTimeToRadians } from './Utils';

import \* as d3 from 'd3-shape';

interface PrayerTimes {

Fajr: number;

Sunrise: number;

Dhuhr: number;

Asr: number;

Maghrib: number;

Isha: number;

Fajr\_tomorrow?: number;

}

interface PrayerArcsProps {

prayerTimes: PrayerTimes;

width: number;

height: number;

}

const PrayerArcs: React.FC<PrayerArcsProps> = ({ prayerTimes, width, height }) => {

const radius = 0.8 \* Math.min(width, height) / 2;

const thickness = 5; // Adjust this to set the thickness of your arcs

// Define the arcs for the prayers

const prayerArcs = \[

{ start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes), color: 'pink' },

{ start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes), color: 'lightblue' },

{ start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes), color: 'yellow' },

{ start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes), color: 'orange' },

{ start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes), color: 'purple' },

{ start: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes), end: mapTimeToRadians(prayerTimes.Fajr\_tomorrow || prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes), color: 'darkblue' },

\];

const drawArc = (arc: { start: number; end: number }) => {

const arcGenerator = d3.arc()

.innerRadius(radius - thickness) // Set the inner radius

.outerRadius(radius)

.startAngle(arc.start)

.endAngle(arc.end);

return arcGenerator();

};

return (

<Svg width={width} height={height}>

<G transform={\`translate(${width / 2}, ${height / 2})\`}>

{prayerArcs.map((arcItem, index) => (

<Path key={index} d={drawArc(arcItem)} stroke={arcItem.color} strokeWidth={2} fill={arcItem.color} />

))}

</G>

</Svg>

);

};

export default PrayerArcs;

  }
  return {name: 'Night', className: 'night'};

        new PrayerArc('Late Night', 'lateNight', 'black', 'Late Night', 'Fajr')
    ];

    prayerArcs.forEach(arc => arc.draw(prayerTimes, line));

    const timePoints = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

    timePoints.forEach(prayerName => drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes));
}

// Parse a time string into a Date object
function parseTime(time) {
    if (time instanceof Date) {
        time = time.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
    }
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle

function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
        return -18;
    }
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    // and scale it up by the ratio of the full circle to the angle range
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}

        .attr("r", earthRadius)

        .attr("x1", 0)
        .attr("y1", height - earthRadius)
        .attr("x2", width)
        .attr("y2", height - earthRadius)
        .attr("stroke", "black")
        .attr("stroke-width", 2);

    const prayerTimes = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

    prayerTimes.forEach((prayer, i) => {
        const angle = timeToCartesianAngle(timings[prayer], timings.Fajr, timings.Isha);
        const svgAngle = cartesianToSvg(angle);
        const svgRadians = svgAngle * Math.PI / 180;

        const dot = svg.append("circle")
            .attr("cx", width / 2 + (radius - 5) * Math.cos(svgRadians))
            .attr("cy", height - earthRadius - (radius - 5) * Math.sin(svgRadians))
            .attr("r", 5)

        svg.append("text")
            .attr("x", width / 2 + (radius + 10) * Math.cos(svgRadians))
            .attr("y", height - earthRadius - (radius + 10) * Math.sin(svgRadians))
            .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
            .attr("font-size", "12px")
            .text(`${prayer}: ${timings[prayer]}`);
    });
}

function timeToCartesianAngle(time, fajrTime, ishaTime) {
    const timeMoment = moment(time, 'HH:mm');
    const fajrMoment = moment(fajrTime, 'HH:mm');
    const ishaMoment = moment(ishaTime, 'HH:mm');

    if (timeMoment.isBefore(fajrMoment)) {
        timeMoment.add(1, 'day');
    }

    const totalMinutes = ishaMoment.add(1, 'day').diff(fajrMoment, 'minutes');
    const minutesFromFajr = timeMoment.diff(fajrMoment, 'minutes');

    const degreesFromFajr = minutesFromFajr / totalMinutes * 216;
    const degrees = (198 + degreesFromFajr) % 360; // Shift the range to 198 to (198 + 216) degrees

    return degrees; // Cartesian angle
}

function cartesianToSvg(angle) {
    return (450 - angle) % 360;
}

<body>
    <div id="sky"></div>
    <input id="latitude" type="number" step="0.0001" placeholder="Latitude" value="51.5074">
    <input id="longitude" type="number" step="0.0001" placeholder="Longitude" value="-0.1278">
    <button id="updateLocation">Update Location</button>
    <button id="startSim">Start Simulation</button>
    <button id="endSim">End Simulation</button>
    <script src="https://d3js.org/d3.v5.min.js"></script>
    <script>
        // Define the sky and its dimensions
        const sky = document.getElementById('sky');
        const width = sky.offsetWidth;
        const height = sky.offsetHeight;
        const radius = 0.8 * Math.min(width, height) / 2;

        // Define the default location (London)
        let lat = 51.5074;
        let lon = -0.1278;

        // Get today's date
        const date = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];

        // Create the SVG container
        const svg = d3.select('#sky').append('svg')
            .attr('width', width)
            .attr('height', height)
            .append('g')
            .attr('transform', `translate(${width / 2}, ${height / 2})`);

        // Create the earth circle
        const earth = svg.append('circle')
            .attr('id', 'earth')
            .attr('r', 40)
            .attr('cx', 0)
            .attr('cy', 0);

        // Create the horizon line
        const horizon = svg.append('line')
            .attr('id', 'horizon')
            .attr('x1', -width / 2)
            .attr('y1', 0)
            .attr('x2', width / 2)
            .attr('y2', 0);

        // Create the sun circle
        const sun = svg.append('circle')
            .attr('id', 'sun')
            .attr('r', 20)
            .attr('cx', 0)
            .attr('cy', 0);

        // Create the sun text
        const sunText = svg.append('text')
            .attr('id', 'sunText')
            .attr('x', 0)
            .attr('y', -30)
            .text('');

        // Initialize the timer, current date, and simulation variables
        let timer;
        let currentDate = new Date();
        let simulation = false;
        let simulationStartTime;

        // Fetch the prayer times
        function fetchPrayerTimes() {
            fetch(`http://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings/${date}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`)
                .then(response => response.json())
                .then(data => {
                    const prayerTimes = data.data.timings;
                    const dayLengthSeconds = (parseTime(prayerTimes.Maghrib) - parseTime(prayerTimes.Fajr)) / 1000;
                    const distancePerSecond = 2 * Math.PI * radius / 86400;

                    timer = setInterval(() => {
                        if (simulation) {
                            let simulatedSeconds = Math.floor((Date.now() - simulationStartTime) / 1000);
                            let simulatedDate = new Date(simulatedSeconds * 1000);
                            moveIndicator(simulatedDate, prayerTimes, distancePerSecond, dayLengthSeconds);
                        } else {
                            currentDate = new Date();
                            moveIndicator(currentDate, prayerTimes, distancePerSecond, dayLengthSeconds);
                        }
                    }, 1000);
                    drawSunPath(prayerTimes);
                });
        }

        fetchPrayerTimes();

        // Update the location when the "Update Location" button is clicked
        d3.select('#updateLocation').on('click', () => {
            lat = document.getElementById('latitude').value;
            lon = document.getElementById('longitude').value;
            clearInterval(timer);
            fetchPrayerTimes();
        });

        // Start the simulation when the "Start Simulation" button is clicked
        d3.select('#startSim').on('click', () => {
            simulation = true;
            simulationStartTime = Date.now();
        });

        // End the simulation when the "End Simulation" button is clicked
        d3.select('#endSim').on('click', () => {
            simulation = false;
        });

        // Draw the sun path
        function drawSunPath(times) {
            // Remove any existing paths
            svg.selectAll('path').remove();
            svg.selectAll("text").remove();

            // Define the segments for each prayer time

const radius = 0.8 * Math.min(width, height) / 2;

// Helper functions
function fetchPrayerTimesForDay(date) {
    return fetch(`http://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings/${date.getDate()}-${date.getMonth()+1}-${date.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`)
        .then(res => res.json())
        .then(data => data.data.timings);
}

function getPrayerDayBoundaries(times) {
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    return { start, end };
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    const radians = (angle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}

function getSunPosition(radians) {
    const x = radius * Math.cos(radians);
    const y = -radius * Math.sin(radians); // Negate y to rotate clockwise
    return { x, y };
}

// Fetch prayer times
function fetchPrayerTimes() {
    const today = new Date();
    const tomorrow = new Date(today);
    tomorrow.setDate(tomorrow.getDate() + 1);

    const promises = [
        fetchPrayerTimesForDay(today),
        fetchPrayerTimesForDay(tomorrow)
    ];

    Promise.all(promises)
        .then(([todayTimes, tomorrowTimes]) => {
            const prayerTimes = {
                ...todayTimes,
                Fajr_tomorrow: tomorrowTimes.Fajr
            }

            const {start, end} = getPrayerDayBoundaries(prayerTimes);
            const dayLengthSeconds = (end - start) / 1000;
            const distancePerSecond = 2 * Math.PI * radius / dayLengthSeconds;

            timer = setInterval(() => {
                const currentTime = new Date();
                moveIndicator(currentTime, prayerTimes, distancePerSecond, dayLengthSeconds);

            drawSunPath(prayerTimes);

    const prayerTimes = [

        const textX = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? x - 10 : x + 10;

        svg.append('text').attr('class', 'timeText').attr('x', textX).attr('y', textY).attr('text-anchor', textAnchor).text(prayerName + ' ' + prayerTimes[prayerName]);

        {name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn'},
        {name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr'},
        {name: 'Asr', className: 'asr'},
        {name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib'},
        {name: 'Isha', className: 'isha'},
        {name: 'Night', className: 'night'}
    ];
    for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
        const checkingTime = new Date();
        const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
        checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
        checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        checkingTime.setSeconds(0);   // set seconds to zero
        checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0); // set milliseconds to zero

        if (currentTime < checkingTime) {

}


function drawSunPath(prayerTimes) {
    const segments = [
        { start: prayerTimes.Fajr, end: prayerTimes.Sunrise, color: 'pink', offset: -18 },

    ];
    const line = d3.line().x(d => -d.x).y(d => d.y);

            return { x: radius * Math.cos(radians), y: radius * Math.sin(radians) };
        });
        svg.append('path').attr('d', line(points)).attr('stroke', segment.color).attr('stroke-width', 2).attr('fill', 'none');
    });

    const timePoints = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

    timePoints.forEach(prayerName => {

        const x = -radius * Math.cos(radians);

    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle
function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);

}

// Parse a time string into a Date object
function parseTime(time) {
    if (time instanceof Date) {
        time = time.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
    }
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle

function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
        return -18;
    }
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    const radians = (angle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}

// Get the current prayer time
function getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, times) {
  const prayerTimes = [
       {name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr'},
       {name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn'},
       {name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr'},
       {name: 'Asr', className: 'asr'},
       {name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib'},
       {name: 'Isha', className: 'isha'},
       {name: 'Late Night', className: 'late-night'}  // added Late Night
   ];
    for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
        const checkingTime = new Date();
        const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
        checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
        checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        checkingTime.setSeconds(0);   // set seconds to zero
        checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0); // set milliseconds to zero
//        console.log(`Current Time: ${currentTime}, Checking Time for ${prayerTimes[i].name}: ${checkingTime}`);
        if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
            console.log(`Current prayer is: ${prayerTimes[i - 1].name}`);
            return prayerTimes[i - 1];
        }
    }

}

function drawPath(segment, prayerTimes, line) {
    let startAngle, endAngle;
    if (segment.start === 'Late Night') {
        startAngle = 162;
        endAngle = 18;
    } else {
        startAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.start, prayerTimes);
        endAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.end, prayerTimes);
    }


    // Start at the offset angle, and decrease the angle (for clockwise direction)
    const points = d3.range(startAngle, endAngle, -0.1).map(angle => {
        const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
        return { x: radius * Math.cos(radians), y: radius * Math.sin(radians) };
    });
    svg.append('path').attr('d', line(points)).attr('stroke', segment.color).attr('stroke-width', 2).attr('fill', 'none');
}

function drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(prayerTimes[prayerName], prayerTimes);
    const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
    const x = -radius * Math.cos(radians);
    const y = radius * Math.sin(radians);
    const textAnchor = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? "start" : "end";
    const textX = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? x - 10 : x + 10;
    const textY = y < 0 ? y - 10 : y + 10;
    svg.append('text').attr('class', 'timeText').attr('x', textX).attr('y', textY).attr('text-anchor', textAnchor).text(prayerName + ' ' + prayerTimes[prayerName]);
}

function drawSunPath(prayerTimes) {
    const segments = [
        { start: prayerTimes.Fajr, end: prayerTimes.Sunrise, color: 'pink', offset: -18 },
        { start: prayerTimes.Sunrise, end: prayerTimes.Dhuhr, color: 'lightblue', offset: 0 },
        { start: prayerTimes.Dhuhr, end: prayerTimes.Asr, color: 'yellow', offset: 0 },
        { start: prayerTimes.Asr, end: prayerTimes.Maghrib, color: 'orange', offset: 0 },
        { start: prayerTimes.Maghrib, end: prayerTimes.Isha, color: 'purple', offset: 0 },
        { start: prayerTimes.Isha, end: prayerTimes.Fajr, color: 'darkblue', offset: 0 },
        { start: 'Late Night', end: 'Fajr', color: 'black', offset: -18 }  // added Late Night to Fajr
      ];

    const line = d3.line().x(d => -d.x).y(d => d.y);

    segments.forEach(segment => drawPath(segment, prayerTimes, line));

    const timePoints = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

    timePoints.forEach(prayerName => drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes));
}

// Parse a time string into a Date object
function parseTime(time) {
    if (time instanceof Date) {
        time = time.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
    }
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle

function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
        return -18;
    }
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    // and scale it up by the ratio of the full circle to the angle range
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}

Each section of the arc should be colored according to the sky's color at that prayer time, transitioning from the color of one prayer time to the next.

Please note that Thuhur is at high noon when the sun is at its zenith, not at 12 PM. Sunrise represents the end of Fajir prayer time. Each prayer time begins at the specified time and ends just before the next prayer time begins.

Mark the boundary of each prayer time with a dot. A hover effect over each dot should display the prayer name and a short description of the astronomical calculation for that prayer time.

class Sun {
    constructor() {
        this.x = 0;
        this.y = 0;
        this.text = "";
        this.anchor = "end";
    }

    updatePosition(x, y) {
        this.x = x;
        this.y = y;
        sun.attr('cx', this.x).attr('cy', this.y);
    }

    updateText(name, currentTime) {
        this.text = currentTime.toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour12: false }) + ' ' + name;
        this.anchor = ["Asr", "Maghrib", "Isha"].includes(name) ? "start" : "end";
        sunText.attr('x', this.x).attr('y', this.y - 30).attr('text-anchor', this.anchor).text(this.text);
        const bbox = sunText.node().getBBox();
        sunTextBackground.attr('x', bbox.x - 2).attr('y', bbox.y - 2).attr('width', bbox.width + 4).attr('height', bbox.height + 4);
    }

    moveTo(currentTime, times, distancePerSecond, dayLengthSeconds) {
        const radians = mapTimeToAngle(currentTime, times) * Math.PI / 180;
        const { x, y } = getSunPosition(radians);
        this.updatePosition(x, -y);

        const { name, className } = determineCurrentPrayer(currentTime, times);
        changeBodyClass(className);
        this.updateText(name, currentTime);
    }
}
class PrayerArc {
    constructor(name, className, color, start, end) {
        this.name = name;
        this.className = className;
        this.color = color;
        this.start = start;
        this.end = end;
    }

    draw(prayerTimes, line) {
        let startAngle, endAngle;
        if (this.start === 'Late Night') {
            startAngle = 162;
            endAngle = 18;
        } else {
            startAngle = mapTimeToAngle(this.start, prayerTimes);
            endAngle = mapTimeToAngle(this.end, prayerTimes);
        }
        const points = d3.range(startAngle, endAngle, -0.1).map(angle => {
            const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
            return { x: radius * Math.cos(radians), y: radius * Math.sin(radians) };
        });
        svg.append('path').attr('d', line(points)).attr('stroke', this.color).attr('stroke-width', 2).attr('fill', 'none');
    }
}

    return { x, y };

// Fetch prayer times for a given day
function fetchPrayerTimesForDay(date) {

function determineCurrentPrayer(currentTime, times) {

function changeBodyClass(className) {

// Get the current prayer time
function getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, times) {
  const prayerTimes = [
       {name: 'Fajr', className: 'fajr'},
       {name: 'Sunrise', className: 'dawn'},
       {name: 'Dhuhr', className: 'dhuhr'},
       {name: 'Asr', className: 'asr'},
       {name: 'Maghrib', className: 'maghrib'},
       {name: 'Isha', className: 'isha'},
       {name: 'Late Night', className: 'late-night'}  // added Late Night
   ];
    for (let i = 1; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
        const checkingTime = new Date();
        const [hours, minutes] = times[prayerTimes[i].name].split(':');
        checkingTime.setHours(+hours);
        checkingTime.setMinutes(+minutes);
        checkingTime.setSeconds(0);   // set seconds to zero
        checkingTime.setMilliseconds(0); // set milliseconds to zero
//        console.log(`Current Time: ${currentTime}, Checking Time for ${prayerTimes[i].name}: ${checkingTime}`);
        if (currentTime < checkingTime) {
            console.log(`Current prayer is: ${prayerTimes[i - 1].name}`);
            return prayerTimes[i - 1];
        }
    }
    console.log("Current prayer is: Isha");
    return {name: 'Night', className: 'night'};
}

function drawPath(segment, prayerTimes, line) {
    let startAngle, endAngle;
    if (segment.start === 'Late Night') {
        startAngle = 162;
        endAngle = 18;
    } else {
        startAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.start, prayerTimes);
        endAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.end, prayerTimes);
    }


    // Start at the offset angle, and decrease the angle (for clockwise direction)
    const points = d3.range(startAngle, endAngle, -0.1).map(angle => {
        const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
        return { x: radius * Math.cos(radians), y: radius * Math.sin(radians) };
    });
    svg.append('path').attr('d', line(points)).attr('stroke', segment.color).attr('stroke-width', 2).attr('fill', 'none');
}

function drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(prayerTimes[prayerName], prayerTimes);
    const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
    const x = -radius * Math.cos(radians);
    const y = radius * Math.sin(radians);
    const textAnchor = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? "start" : "end";
    const textX = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? x - 10 : x + 10;
    const textY = y < 0 ? y - 10 : y + 10;
    svg.append('text').attr('class', 'timeText').attr('x', textX).attr('y', textY).attr('text-anchor', textAnchor).text(prayerName + ' ' + prayerTimes[prayerName]);
}

function drawSunPath(prayerTimes) {
    const line = d3.line().x(d => -d.x).y(d => d.y);

    const prayerArcs = [
        new PrayerArc('Fajr', 'fajr', 'pink', prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes.Sunrise),
        new PrayerArc('Sunrise', 'dawn', 'lightblue', prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes.Dhuhr),
        new PrayerArc('Dhuhr', 'dhuhr', 'yellow', prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes.Asr),
        new PrayerArc('Asr', 'asr', 'orange', prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes.Maghrib),
        new PrayerArc('Maghrib', 'maghrib', 'purple', prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes.Isha),
        new PrayerArc('Isha', 'isha', 'darkblue', prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes.Fajr),
        new PrayerArc('Late Night', 'late-night', 'black', 'Late Night', 'Fajr')
    ];

    prayerArcs.forEach(arc => arc.draw(prayerTimes, line));

    const timePoints = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

    timePoints.forEach(prayerName => drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes));
}

// Parse a time string into a Date object
function parseTime(time) {
    if (time instanceof Date) {
        time = time.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
    }
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle

function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
        return -18;
    }
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    // and scale it up by the ratio of the full circle to the angle range
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}

# Variable Speed Audiobook Tool
# A Python script that processes a text file from Project Gutenberg, analyzing complexity and adjusting playback speed accordingly.

# Import libraries
import textstat # for complexity analysis
import gtts # for text-to-speech
import re # for text processing
import os # for file handling
import time # for time formatting
import json # for json export
import shutil # for directory removal


# Define constants
NORMAL_SPEED = 1 # normal playback speed
MAX_SPEED = 2.5 # maximum playback speed
FLESCH_MIDPOINT = 50 # midpoint of Flesch score range
FLESCH_MIN = 0 # minimum Flesch score
FLESCH_MAX = 100 # maximum Flesch score
BLOCK_SIZE = 1000 # number of characters per text block
REPORT_FILE = "report.json" # name of the report file

# Define functions

def time_str_to_ms(time_str):
    h, m, s = map(float, time_str.split(':'))
    return int((h * 3600 + m * 60 + s) * 1000)

def get_flesch_score(text):
    """Returns the Flesch Reading Ease Score of a given text, or 0 if the score is negative."""
    score = textstat.flesch_reading_ease(text)
    if score < 0:
        score = 0
    return score

def get_speed_factor(score):
    """Returns the speed factor corresponding to a given Flesch score, ranging from NORMAL_SPEED to MAX_SPEED."""
    factor = NORMAL_SPEED + (score - FLESCH_MIDPOINT) * (MAX_SPEED - NORMAL_SPEED) / (FLESCH_MAX - FLESCH_MIN)
    return factor

def split_text(text):
    """Returns a list of text blocks, each with a maximum size of BLOCK_SIZE characters."""
    blocks = []
    while text:
        block = text[:BLOCK_SIZE]
        text = text[BLOCK_SIZE:]
        blocks.append(block)
    return blocks

def process_text(text_file):
    """Processes a text file, analyzing complexity, adjusting speed, and generating output files."""

    # Load text file
    with open(text_file, "r") as f:
        text = f.read()

    # Remove any non-ASCII characters from the text
    text = re.sub(r"[^\x00-\x7F]+", "", text)

    # Split the text into blocks
    blocks = split_text(text)

    # Initialize variables for output files
    report = [] # report list with analysis and timestamps

    # Loop through each block
    for i, block in enumerate(blocks):

        # Get the Flesch score and the speed factor for the block
        flesch_score = get_flesch_score(block)
        speed_factor = get_speed_factor(flesch_score)

        # Save the block as an audio file in a temporary directory using gTTS
        temp_dir = os.path.join(os.getcwd(), "temp")
        os.makedirs(temp_dir, exist_ok=True)
        audio_file = os.path.join(temp_dir, f"block_{i+1}.mp3")
        tts = gtts.gTTS(block, lang="en", slow=False)
        tts.save(audio_file)

        # Get the duration and the start time of the block in milliseconds
        duration = len(block) * 60000 / (speed_factor * 200) * speed_factor
        start_time = sum(time_str_to_ms(b["duration"]) for b in report)

        # Format the start time and the duration as hh:mm:ss.ms strings
        start_time_str = time.strftime("%H:%M:%S.%f", time.gmtime(start_time / 1000))
        duration_str = time.strftime("%H:%M:%S.%f", time.gmtime(duration / 1000))

        # Append the block information to the report list
        report.append({
            "block": i+1,
            "text": block,
            "flesch_score": flesch_score,
            "speed_factor": speed_factor,
            "start_time": start_time_str,
            "duration": duration_str,
        })

    # Merge all the audio files into one using ffmpeg command line tool with atempo filter to adjust speed
    base_dir = os.path.dirname(text_file)
    base_name = os.path.splitext(os.path.basename(text_file))[0]
    new_audio_file = os.path.join(base_dir, base_name + f"_adjusted_{speed_factor}x.mp3")
    command = f"ffmpeg -y -i \"concat:{'|'.join([os.path.join(temp_dir, f) for f in os.listdir(temp_dir)])}\" -filter:a \"atempo={speed_factor}\" -vn {new_audio_file}"
    os.system(command)

    # Delete the temporary directory
    shutil.rmtree(temp_dir)

    # Save the report file in the same directory as the input file as a json file
    report_file = os.path.join(base_dir, REPORT_FILE)
    with open(report_file, "w") as f:
        json.dump(report, f, indent=4)

    # Return the output file names
    return new_audio_file, report_file

# Main program

# Get the input file name from the user
text_file = input("Enter the name of the text file (.txt format): ")

# Process the text file
new_audio_file, report_file = process_text(text_file)

# Print the output file names
print(f"New audio file: {new_audio_file}")
print(f"Report file: {report_file}")

# End of script

    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    // and scale it up by the ratio of the full circle to the angle range
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;

    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle

function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
        return -18;
    }
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    // and scale it up by the ratio of the full circle to the angle range
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}

function drawSunPath(prayerTimes) { const segments = \[ { start: prayerTimes.Fajr, end: prayerTimes.Sunrise, color: 'pink', offset: -18 }, { start: prayerTimes.Sunrise, end: prayerTimes.Dhuhr, color: 'lightblue', offset: 0 }, { start: prayerTimes.Dhuhr, end: prayerTimes.Asr, color: 'yellow', offset: 0 }, { start: prayerTimes.Asr, end: prayerTimes.Maghrib, color: 'orange', offset: 0 }, { start: prayerTimes.Maghrib, end: prayerTimes.Isha, color: 'purple', offset: 0 }, { start: prayerTimes.Isha, end: "40 degrees below horizon", color: 'darkblue', offset: 18 }, { start: "40 degrees below horizon", end: -162, color: 'darkblue', offset: 18 }, { start: -162, end: -18, color: 'darkblue', offset: -18 } \]; const line = d3.line().x(d => -d.x).y(d => d.y);

    segments.forEach(segment => {
        const startAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.start, prayerTimes);
    
        let endAngle;
    
        // Special case for when the sun is 40 degrees below the horizon
        if (segment.end === "40 degrees below horizon") {
            const ishaTime = parseTime(prayerTimes.Isha);
            // Add 2 hours and 40 minutes to the Isha time
            ishaTime.setHours(ishaTime.getHours() + 2, ishaTime.getMinutes() + 40);
            endAngle = mapTimeToAngle(ishaTime, prayerTimes);
        } else {
            endAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.end, prayerTimes);
        }
        console.log(startAngle, endAngle);
        // Start at the offset angle, and decrease the angle (for clockwise direction)
        const points = d3.range(startAngle, endAngle, -0.1).map(angle => {
            const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
            return { x: radius * Math.cos(radians), y: radius * Math.sin(radians) };
        });
        svg.append('path').attr('d', line(points)).attr('stroke', segment.color).attr('stroke-width', 2).attr('fill', 'none');
    });
    
    const timePoints = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha', 'Late Night'];
    
    timePoints.forEach(prayerName => {
        const angle = mapTimeToAngle(prayerTimes[prayerName], prayerTimes);
        const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
        const x = -radius * Math.cos(radians);
        const y = radius * Math.sin(radians);
        const textAnchor = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? "start" : "end";
        const textX = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? x - 10 : x + 10;
        const textY = y < 0 ? y - 10 : y + 10;
        svg.append('text').attr('class', 'timeText').attr('x', textX).attr('y', textY).attr('text-anchor', textAnchor).text(prayerName + ' ' + prayerTimes[prayerName]);
    });

function fetchPrayerTimes() {
    const today = new Date();
    const tomorrow = new Date(today);
    tomorrow.setDate(tomorrow.getDate() + 1);

    const promises = [
        fetch(`http://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings/${today.getDate()}-${today.getMonth()+1}-${today.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`),
        fetch(`http://api.aladhan.com/v1/timings/${tomorrow.getDate()}-${tomorrow.getMonth()+1}-${tomorrow.getFullYear()}?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&method=2`)
    ];

    Promise.all(promises)
        .then(responses => Promise.all(responses.map(res => res.json())))
        .then(([todayData, tomorrowData]) => {
            const todayTimes = todayData.data.timings;
            const tomorrowTimes = tomorrowData.data.timings;

            // Combine the prayer times into one object
            const prayerTimes = {

            }

            timer = setInterval(() => {
                currentDate = new Date();
                moveIndicator(currentDate, prayerTimes, distancePerSecond, dayLengthSeconds);

}

    const x = -radius * Math.cos(radians);
    const y = radius * Math.sin(radians);
    const textAnchor = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? "start" : "end";
    const textX = ["Dhuhr", "Asr", "Maghrib"].includes(prayerName) ? x - 10 : x + 10;
    const textY = y < 0 ? y - 10 : y + 10;

function drawSunPath(prayerTimes) {
    const line = d3.line().x(d => -d.x).y(d => d.y);

    const prayerArcs = [
        new PrayerArc('Fajr', 'fajr', 'pink', prayerTimes.Fajr, prayerTimes.Sunrise),
        new PrayerArc('Sunrise', 'dawn', 'lightblue', prayerTimes.Sunrise, prayerTimes.Dhuhr),
        new PrayerArc('Dhuhr', 'dhuhr', 'yellow', prayerTimes.Dhuhr, prayerTimes.Asr),
        new PrayerArc('Asr', 'asr', 'orange', prayerTimes.Asr, prayerTimes.Maghrib),
        new PrayerArc('Maghrib', 'maghrib', 'purple', prayerTimes.Maghrib, prayerTimes.Isha),
        new PrayerArc('Isha', 'isha', 'darkblue', prayerTimes.Isha, prayerTimes.Fajr),
        new PrayerArc('Late Night', 'lateNight', 'black', 'Late Night', 'Fajr')
    ];

    prayerArcs.forEach(arc => arc.draw(prayerTimes, line));

    const timePoints = ['Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib', 'Isha'];

    timePoints.forEach(prayerName => drawTimePoint(prayerName, prayerTimes));
}

// Parse a time string into a Date object
function parseTime(time) {
    if (time instanceof Date) {
        time = time.toTimeString().split(' ')[0];
    }
    const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
    const date = new Date();
    date.setHours(hours, minutes, 0, 0);
    return date;
}// Map a time to an angle

function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
    if (time === 'Late Night') {
        return -18;
    }
    const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
    const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
    const current = parseTime(time);
    const angle = ((current - start) / (end - start) * (198 - (-18))) + (-18);
    return -angle;
}

function mapTimeToRadians(time, times) {
    const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time, times);
    // convert the angle from degrees to radians
    // and scale it up by the ratio of the full circle to the angle range
    const scaledAngle = angle * (360 / 198);
    const radians = (scaledAngle - 90) * Math.PI / 180;
    return radians;
}

# Variable Speed Audiobook Tool
# A Python script that processes a text file from Project Gutenberg, analyzing complexity and adjusting playback speed accordingly.

# Import libraries
import textstat # for complexity analysis
import gtts # for text-to-speech
import re # for text processing
import os # for file handling
import time # for time formatting
import json # for json export
import shutil # for directory removal


# Define constants
NORMAL_SPEED = 1 # normal playback speed
MAX_SPEED = 2.5 # maximum playback speed
FLESCH_MIDPOINT = 50 # midpoint of Flesch score range
FLESCH_MIN = 0 # minimum Flesch score
FLESCH_MAX = 100 # maximum Flesch score
BLOCK_SIZE = 1000 # number of characters per text block
REPORT_FILE = "report.json" # name of the report file

# Define functions

def time_str_to_ms(time_str):
    h, m, s = map(float, time_str.split(':'))
    return int((h * 3600 + m * 60 + s) * 1000)

def get_flesch_score(text):
    """Returns the Flesch Reading Ease Score of a given text, or 0 if the score is negative."""
    score = textstat.flesch_reading_ease(text)
    if score < 0:
        score = 0
    return score

def get_speed_factor(score):
    """Returns the speed factor corresponding to a given Flesch score, ranging from NORMAL_SPEED to MAX_SPEED."""
    factor = NORMAL_SPEED + (score - FLESCH_MIDPOINT) * (MAX_SPEED - NORMAL_SPEED) / (FLESCH_MAX - FLESCH_MIN)
    return factor

def split_text(text):
    """Returns a list of text blocks, each with a maximum size of BLOCK_SIZE characters."""
    blocks = []
    while text:
        block = text[:BLOCK_SIZE]
        text = text[BLOCK_SIZE:]
        blocks.append(block)
    return blocks

def process_text(text_file):
    """Processes a text file, analyzing complexity, adjusting speed, and generating output files."""

    # Load text file
    with open(text_file, "r") as f:
        text = f.read()

    # Remove any non-ASCII characters from the text
    text = re.sub(r"[^\x00-\x7F]+", "", text)

    # Split the text into blocks
    blocks = split_text(text)

    # Initialize variables for output files
    report = [] # report list with analysis and timestamps

    # Loop through each block
    for i, block in enumerate(blocks):

        # Get the Flesch score and the speed factor for the block
        flesch_score = get_flesch_score(block)
        speed_factor = get_speed_factor(flesch_score)

        # Save the block as an audio file in a temporary directory using gTTS
        temp_dir = os.path.join(os.getcwd(), "temp")
        os.makedirs(temp_dir, exist_ok=True)
        audio_file = os.path.join(temp_dir, f"block_{i+1}.mp3")
        tts = gtts.gTTS(block, lang="en", slow=False)
        tts.save(audio_file)

        # Get the duration and the start time of the block in milliseconds
        duration = len(block) * 60000 / (speed_factor * 200) * speed_factor
        start_time = sum(time_str_to_ms(b["duration"]) for b in report)

        # Format the start time and the duration as hh:mm:ss.ms strings
        start_time_str = time.strftime("%H:%M:%S.%f", time.gmtime(start_time / 1000))
        duration_str = time.strftime("%H:%M:%S.%f", time.gmtime(duration / 1000))

        # Append the block information to the report list
        report.append({
            "block": i+1,
            "text": block,
            "flesch_score": flesch_score,
            "speed_factor": speed_factor,
            "start_time": start_time_str,
            "duration": duration_str,
        })

    # Merge all the audio files into one using ffmpeg command line tool with atempo filter to adjust speed
    base_dir = os.path.dirname(text_file)
    base_name = os.path.splitext(os.path.basename(text_file))[0]
    new_audio_file = os.path.join(base_dir, base_name + f"_adjusted_{speed_factor}x.mp3")
    command = f"ffmpeg -y -i \"concat:{'|'.join([os.path.join(temp_dir, f) for f in os.listdir(temp_dir)])}\" -filter:a \"atempo={speed_factor}\" -vn {new_audio_file}"
    os.system(command)

    # Delete the temporary directory
    shutil.rmtree(temp_dir)

    # Save the report file in the same directory as the input file as a json file
    report_file = os.path.join(base_dir, REPORT_FILE)
    with open(report_file, "w") as f:
        json.dump(report, f, indent=4)

    # Return the output file names
    return new_audio_file, report_file

# Main program

# Get the input file name from the user
text_file = input("Enter the name of the text file (.txt format): ")

# Process the text file
new_audio_file, report_file = process_text(text_file)

# Print the output file names
print(f"New audio file: {new_audio_file}")
print(f"Report file: {report_file}")

# End of script

function addTime(time, hoursToAdd) {

    <script>
        const width = 500;
        const height = 500;
        const radius = 240;
        const lat = 51.5074; // London
        const lon = -0.1278; // London
        const date = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; // Today's date

        const horizon = svg.append('line')
            .attr('id', 'horizon')
            .attr('x1', 0)
            .attr('y1', height / 2)
            .attr('x2', width)
            .attr('y2', height / 2);
        const sun = svg.append('circle')
            .attr('id', 'sun')
            .attr('r', 20)
            .attr('cx', width / 2)
            .attr('cy', height / 2);
        const sunText = svg.append('text')
            .attr('id', 'sunText')
            .attr('x', width / 2)
            .attr('y', height / 2 - 30)

            .then(response => response.json())
            .then(data => {
                const prayerTimes = data.data.timings;
                const dayLengthSeconds = (parseTime(prayerTimes.Maghrib) - parseTime(prayerTimes.Fajr)) / 1000;
                const horizonLineHeight = mapDayLengthToHorizonHeight(dayLengthSeconds);
                horizon.attr('y1', horizonLineHeight).attr('y2', horizonLineHeight);
                drawSunPath(prayerTimes, width, height);
                const distancePerSecond = 2 * Math.PI * radius / 86400;

                timer = setInterval(() => {
                    if (simulateDay) {
                        let simulatedSeconds = Math.floor((Date.now() - simulateDay) / 1000);
                        let simulatedDate = new Date(simulateStartTime.getTime() + simulatedSeconds * 1000);
                        moveIndicator(simulatedDate, prayerTimes, width, height, distancePerSecond, dayLengthSeconds);
                    } else {
                        currentDate = new Date();
                        moveIndicator(currentDate, prayerTimes, width, height, distancePerSecond, dayLengthSeconds);
                    }
                }, 1000);
            });

        d3.select('#today').on('click', () => {
            clearInterval(timer);
            simulateDay = null;
            currentDate = new Date();
        });

        d3.select('#simulateDay').on('click', () => {
            clearInterval(timer);
            simulateDay = Date.now();
            simulateStartTime = new Date();
            simulateStartTime.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
        });

        function mapDayLengthToHorizonHeight(dayLengthSeconds) {
            const maxDayLength = 16 * 3600; // Maximum possible day length is approximated to be 16 hours
            const horizonHeight = height / 2 + ((dayLengthSeconds - maxDayLength / 2) / maxDayLength) * height / 2;
            return Math.max(horizonHeight, 0);
        }

        function drawSunPath(times, width, height) {
            const svg = d3.select('#sky');
            svg.selectAll('path').remove();

            const segments = [
                { start: times.Isha, end: times.Fajr, color: 'black' },
                { start: times.Fajr, end: times.Sunrise, color: 'pink' },
                { start: times.Sunrise, end: times.Dhuhr, color: 'lightblue' },
                { start: times.Dhuhr, end: times.Asr, color: 'yellow' },
                { start: times.Asr, end: times.Maghrib, color: 'orange' },
                { start: times.Maghrib, end: times.Isha, color: 'purple' },
            ];

            const line = d3.line()
                .x(d => d.x)
                .y(d => d.y);

            segments.forEach(segment => {
                const startAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.start, times);
                const endAngle = mapTimeToAngle(segment.end, times);
                const points = d3.range(startAngle, endAngle, 1).map(angle => {
                    const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
                    return {
                        x: width / 2 + radius * Math.cos(radians),
                        y: height / 2 - radius * Math.sin(radians),
                    };
                });
                svg.append('path')
                    .attr('d', line(points))
                    .attr('stroke', segment.color)
                    .attr('stroke-width', 2)
                    .attr('fill', 'none');
            });

            const timePoints = ['Isha', 'Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib'];
            timePoints.forEach(time => {
                const angle = mapTimeToAngle(times[time], times);
                const radians = angle * Math.PI / 180;
                const x = width / 2 + radius * Math.cos(radians);
                const y = height / 2 - radius * Math.sin(radians);
                svg.append('text')
                    .attr('class', 'timeText')
                    .attr('x', x)
                    .attr('y', y)
                    .text(time + ' ' + times[time]);
            });
        }

        function mapTimeToAngle(time, times) {
            const start = parseTime(times.Fajr);
            const end = parseTime(times.Isha);
            const current = parseTime(time);
            const angle = (current - start) / (end - start) * 360;
            return angle;
        }

        function parseTime(time) {
            const [hours, minutes] = time.split(':');
            const date = new Date();
            date.setHours(+hours);
            date.setMinutes(+minutes);
            return date;
        }

        function moveIndicator(time, times, width, height, distancePerSecond, dayLengthSeconds) {
            const angle = mapTimeToAngle(time.toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour12: false }), times);
            const secondsIntoDay = (time - parseTime(times.Fajr)) / 1000;
            const distanceTravelled = Math.min(secondsIntoDay, dayLengthSeconds) * distancePerSecond;
            const x = width / 2 + radius * Math.cos(distanceTravelled / radius);
            const y = height / 2 - radius * Math.sin(distanceTravelled / radius);
            sun.attr('cx', x).attr('cy', y);
            sunText.attr('x', x).attr('y', y - 30).text(time.toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour12: false }) + ' ' + getCurrentPrayerTime(time, times));
        }

        function getCurrentPrayerTime(currentTime, times) {
            const prayerTimes = ['Isha', 'Fajr', 'Sunrise', 'Dhuhr', 'Asr', 'Maghrib'];
            for (let i = 0; i < prayerTimes.length; i++) {
                if (currentTime < parseTime(times[prayerTimes[i]])) {
                    return prayerTimes[i - 1];
                }
            }
            return 'Isha';
        }

            const location = { latitude: 48.8566, longitude: 2.3522 };  // Paris, France

            // Calculate prayer times

                    moveIndicator(prayerTimes);
                });

            function displayPrayerTimes(prayerTimes) {
                const div = d3.select('#prayer-times');
                div.html(`Location: Paris, France<br>Prayer Times: ${Object.entries(prayerTimes).map(([key, value]) => `${key}: ${value}`).join(', ')}`);
            }

            function moveIndicator(prayerTimes) {
                const prayerTimesMinutes = Object.entries(prayerTimes).map(([name, time]) => ({ name, minutes: convertToMinutes(time) })).sort((a, b) => a.minutes - b.minutes);
                const fajrTime = prayerTimesMinutes.find(pt => pt.name === 'Fajr').minutes;

                setInterval(() => {
                    const now = new Date();
                    const dayMinutesElapsed = ((now.getHours() * 60 + now.getMinutes()) - fajrTime + 24 * 60) % (24 * 60);
                    const degrees = (dayMinutesElapsed / (24 * 60)) * 360 - 90;
                    const radians = degrees * (Math.PI / 180);
                    const x = 100 * Math.cos(radians);
                    const y = 100 * Math.sin(radians);

                    indicator.attr('cx', x).attr('cy', y);

                    const currentPrayerTime = getCurrentPrayerTime(dayMinutesElapsed, prayerTimesMinutes);
                    indicatorText.text(currentPrayerTime);
                    indicatorText.attr('x', x).attr('y', y + 5);  // Adjusting y position to avoid overlap with the circle
                }, 1000);  // Update every second
            }

            function convertToMinutes(timeStr) {
                const time = timeStr.split(':').map(Number);
                return time[0] * 60 + time[1];
            }

            function getCurrentPrayerTime(elapsedMinutes, prayerTimesMinutes) {
                let currentPrayerTime = 'Fajr';  // Default value
                for (let i = 0; i < prayerTimesMinutes.length - 1; i++) {
                    if (elapsedMinutes >= prayerTimesMinutes[i].minutes && elapsedMinutes < prayerTimesMinutes[i + 1].minutes) {
                        currentPrayerTime = prayerTimesMinutes[i].name;
                        break;
                    }
                }
                return currentPrayerTime;
            }

            // Simulation Button
            const ONE_DAY_IN_MS = 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000;
            let simulationTimer = null;
            document.getElementById("startSim").addEventListener('click', function(){
                let elapsedMs = 0;
                simulationTimer = setInterval(() => {
                    const dayMinutesElapsed = (elapsedMs / ONE_DAY_IN_MS) * 24 * 60;
                    const degrees = (dayMinutesElapsed / (24 * 60)) * 360 - 90;
                    const radians = degrees * (Math.PI / 180);
                    const x = 100 * Math.cos(radians);
                    const y = 100 * Math.sin(radians);
                    indicator.attr('cx', x).attr('cy', y);
                    elapsedMs += 1000;
                }, 1000);
            });

            // End Simulation Button
            document.getElementById("endSim").addEventListener('click', function(){
                clearInterval(simulationTimer);
                moveIndicator();
            });
        </script>

**1\. Objective:**

The goal of the application is to accurately visualize the passage of time in a way that reflects the natural progression of a day, including the movement of the sun and changing sky colors corresponding to different times of day. This includes:

*   Visualizing the sun's movement across the sky, using a circle to represent the path.
    
*   Adjusting the position of the horizon line depending on the number of daylight hours in the day.
    
*   Showing the current prayer times.
    
*   Changing the background color of the sky according to the time of day.
    
*   Creating a clock face that represents a full 24-hour cycle.
    

**2\. Structure of the Code:**

The code is written in JavaScript and uses the p5.js library for drawing graphics and animations, and the SalahTimes API for fetching the prayer times.

2.1 **Setup function**:

This function is used to initialize the canvas and the elements to be drawn. It sets the size of the canvas, defines the drawing style for the sun, horizon line, and prayer times.

2.2 **FetchPrayerTimes function**:

This function is used to fetch the prayer times from the SalahTimes API. These prayer times are stored in a global object for use elsewhere in the program.

2.3 **Draw function**:

This is where the main visualization occurs. In p5.js, the draw function is called once per frame, creating an animation. It does the following things:

*   Clears the previous frame.
    
*   Draws the sky by changing the background color based on the current time of day.
    
*   Draws the sun at its current position.
    
*   Draws the prayer times.
    
*   Updates the sun's position.
    

2.4 **DrawPrayerTimes function**:

This function is used to display the prayer times at their corresponding positions on the outer circle. It calculates the position of each prayer time by converting the time into an angle, and then uses that angle to draw the prayer time on the outer circle.

**3\. Key Principles:**

3.1 **Sun's Position Calculation**:

The position of the sun is calculated based on the current time of day. The code divides the circumference of the circle into 86400 parts (the number of seconds in a day) and calculates the position of the sun for each second of the day.

3.2 **Horizon Line Adjustment**:

The horizon line's position is determined by the number of daylight hours in the day. The more daylight hours there are, the lower the horizon line is drawn.

3.3 **Prayer Times Display**:

The prayer times are fetched from the SalahTimes API and displayed at their corresponding positions on the outer circle. The position of each prayer time is calculated by converting the time into an angle and drawing it at that angle on the circle.

3.4 **Sky Color Changes**:

The sky's color is determined by the current time of day. The code defines several segments of the day, each with its own color. The background color is then set based on the current segment of the day.

**4\. Potential Improvements:**

4.1 **Error Handling**:

The code could benefit from more robust error handling. For instance, it currently doesn't handle the case when the SalahTimes API is unavailable or returns an error.

4.2 **User Interface Enhancements**:

More user interface enhancements could be made. For instance, it could include features like allowing users to enter their location manually, showing the current date, or adjusting the visualization based on the user's local sunrise and sunset times.

4.3 **Code Structure**:

The code structure could be improved by breaking down the larger functions into smaller ones, each with a single responsibility. This would make the code more readable and maintainable.

    <div class="container">
